style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>&#160;</p><h2>When does Target's Cyber Monday 2020 sale begin?</h2><p>Target's Cyber Monday sale is going on now, through the end of November 30.</p><h2>What is the difference between Cyber Monday and Black Friday?</h2><p>Between <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Black Friday</a> and Cyber Monday, Target will offer both deep and short-lived discounts with one main difference: Cyber Monday sales will only be available online. If you'd prefer to grab the savings in-store, then Black Friday may be the better shopping holiday for you. Additionally, Target is running Black Friday deals all month long.</p><h2>What should I buy from Target during Cyber Monday?</h2><p>Target has exclusive deals on home goods, fitness equipment, and robot vacuums, among other things. It also has great specials that match competitor pricing on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-noise-cancelling-headphones\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">headphones</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-laptop\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">laptops</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-gaming-console\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">gaming consoles</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-home-security-system\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">smart home gear</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cool-kitchen-gadgets-tools\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">small kitchen appliances</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-vacuum\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">vacuums</a>.</p><h2>Can I make returns of what I bought on Cyber Monday at Target?</h2><p>Target, along with other major retailers, have generous return policies provided you have the receipt. If not, or you received something as a gift, you'll most likely get store credit. Return policies vary from store to store, and there are exceptions on select products. Check out our guide on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-return-online-orders\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">how to make a return for online purchases</a>.</p><p>A few stand-out deals we've seen: a Tranquility 12-pound weighted blanket for less than $30, queen and king hypoallergenic comforters for $200 off, Total Gym's Apex G5 all-in-one fitness system for under $500, a versatile water-filled training ball that acts as a kettlebell or medicine ball from Surge Balance, and an Ecovacs two-in-one robot vacuum-and-mop exclusively at Target and for $180 off.</p><h2>What is Target Circle?</h2><p>For shopping benefits like exclusive deals, coupons, and 1% earnings on all purchases, joining <a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fcircle\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Target Circle</a> is a must. It's free to do so and if you're planning to shop from Target at all this Cyber Monday, the savings will really rack up across your purchases.</p><h2>What benefits do REDcard holders get during Cyber Monday?</h2><p><a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fredcard%2Fabout\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Target REDcard</a> holders get an extra 5% off all purchases year-round, but if you're planning to go on a shopping spree this Cyber Monday, that savings can really add up. Additionally, cardholders get free shipping on all online purchases with no purchase minimum required.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/tEWfiKpabio\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 01 Dec 2020 04:46:59 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa47bf01df1d50018219306?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"1c476b6a92653c46f7ce36e09a547764","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-39-297_9ce650df2d4a52da.webp","destWidth":1667,"destHeight":1250,"sourceBytes":90524,"destBytes":90524,"author":"insider@insider.com (Sarah Saril,Rachael Schultz)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fa4754af7d1cb0019e3a1a0?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn95@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-58-937_c445d2a9be8f1a94.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=tEWfiKpabio:S7rbfXWJbvc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn66@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-45-409_09e5ca840d793567.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=tEWfiKpabio:S7rbfXWJbvc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn73@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-42-936_5f6cd47fea18b640.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=tEWfiKpabio:S7rbfXWJbvc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-42-254_b5a73b1dfb570af6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/tEWfiKpabio":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn97@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-44-324_682d5cd12892364e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719440},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Liverpool is attempting mass COVID-19 testing during the UK's lockdown — but the reaction to the program is mixed","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/liverpools-mass-testing-program-is-yielding-mixed-reactions-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc1bb9750e71a0011557ca9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Defence Secretary Ben Wallace/Getty Images\" height=\"2661\" width=\"3549\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Liverpool is undertaking a mass coronavirus testing pilot, with residents having access to lateral flow tests that are able to determine if someone has coronavirus in under an hour.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Peter Byrne/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Liverpool's mass COVID-19 testing program, a pilot in Prime Minister Boris Johnson's \"Operation Moonshot vision,\" is dividing public health officials and politicians, according to The Washington Post.</li>\n<li>The Post reported that as of November 3, Liverpool's weekly rate of COVID-19 tests was 300 cases per 100,000 residents, and as of November 21, the rate was 158 cases per 100,000 residents.&#160;</li>\n<li>Angela Raffle, a senior lecturer at the University of Bristol, told The Post that the mass testing efforts are the \"most unethical proposals for use of public funds or screening.\"</li>\n<li>Other public health officials have decried the accuracy of rapid tests, and pointed out that the testing strategy, which will expand to other cities in England next week, will <a href=\"https://www.bmj.com/content/371/bmj.m4436\">consume</a>&#160;77% of the NHS budget.&#160;</li>\n<li>According to an analysis from <a href=\"https://twitter.com/katierazz/status/1330999988151848961\">BBC Newsnight,</a> only 4% of residents have participated in some of Liverpool's poorest communities.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Liverpool, the UK's tenth largest city, has implemented a mass swabbing and testing program to curb the spread of COVID-19 — and according to new reporting <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/europe/liverpool-mass-testing-coronavirus/2020/11/26/b7421f8c-29cb-11eb-9c21-3cc501d0981f_story.html\">from The Washington Post</a>, there are mixed feelings about the program.</p><p>As a local <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/scientists-sound-warning-about-uk-pm-johnsons-mass-testing-moonshot-2020-11\">effort</a> in the UK's \"Operation Moonshot vision,\" about a third of Liverpool's 500,000 residents since the start of November.</p><p>The implementation of the pilot mass testing program in Liverpool is part of a broader effort to conduct six-week testing surges across the country's \"Tier 3\" cities after the national lockdown ends next week. Tier 3 is the UK's most restrictive set of COVID-19 lockdown measures, which Liverpool sits within, and testing started in Liverpool one day after the national lockdown was announced on November 6.</p><p>Public spaces are being used as testing sites, and the army is assisting with logistics as residents are initially swabbed in their nose and throat and get results in about an hour. If a resident's sample is marked positive, they are offered a polymerase chain reaction (PCR) test, which is more accurate.</p><p>According to The Post, as of November 3, Liverpool's weekly of coronavirus cases&#160;was 300 cases per 100,000 residents, and as of November 21, the rate was 158 cases per 100,000 residents.&#160;</p><p>Within the three weeks of testing in Liverpool, British politicians are widely lauding the program, while many public health officials are questioning the effectiveness and cost of it, according to The Post.</p><p>Prime Minister Boris Johnson, called Liverpool a success story and model for other cities to follow. Health Secretary Matt Hancock also praised the effort and claimed that in Liverpool, cases had declined by two thirds.</p><p>Some critics have aimed their concerns at the rapid tests used in Liverpool, which can have serious accuracy issues and potentially only <a href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/nov/13/covid-test-for-mass-uk-screening-could-miss-up-to-half-of-cases-say-scientists\">correctly identify</a> around half of the asymptomatic carriers.&#160;</p><p>Angela Raffle, a senior lecturer at the University of Bristol, told The Post that the mass testing efforts the \"most unethical proposals for use of public funds or screening.\" Raffle added that the space of a few weeks between tests is not particularly helpful, and said that in order for mass testing to be effective, residents would have to be tested every few days.</p><p>One UK <a href=\"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7353981/\">study</a>, published by Royal Society Open Science, argued that with 10 million weekly tests, together with household quarantine and systematic contact tracing, the mass testing strategy could help lower the spread. &#160;</p><p>Some other public health experts are claiming that the shrinking number of cases could also be a result of the national lockdown, and not solely the mass testing strategy.</p><p>There are also unknowns about how the program is being tracked and studied, according to Jon Deeks, a professor of Biostatistics at the University of Birmingham, who told <a href=\"https://www.wired.co.uk/article/liverpool-mass-testing-covid\">WIRED</a>: \"The Department of Health is being incredibly secretive about what it is going to do, and how this pilot is going to be evaluated. There's a National Screening Committee, which we've had in the UK for 20 years, and they've been sidelined from this.\"</p><p>The Cabinet Office did not immediately respond to a request for comment.&#160;</p><p>In medical journal BMJ, Mike Gill, the former director of Public Health England, was also critical of the pilot, which he called \"an unevaluated, underdesigned, and costly mess\" and claimed that it <a href=\"https://www.bmj.com/content/371/bmj.m4436\">absorbed</a> up to 77% of the NHS' national budget.&#160;</p><p>At the start of December, 40% of England's population will be eligible for mass testing, and the government's goal is to swab 10 million people a day. The effort will cost more than $130 billion dollars according to The Post.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/liverpools-mass-testing-program-is-yielding-mixed-reactions-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a Don't forget to use the code&#160;<strong>CYBER25</strong> for additional savings on select items.</p><h2>What is Nike's return policy?</h2><p>Right now during the holiday season, Nike has an extended 60-day return policy.</p><h2>Can I shop at the Nike store near me?</h2><p>Yes, you can shop deals at Nike stores. Stores may have limited stock and availability, so shopping online is probably the best way to get everything you want.&#160;</p><h2 id=\"what-should-i-buy-from-best-buy-this-black-friday?\">What should I buy from Nike this Cyber Monday?</h2><p>Aside from sneakers, Nike's Cyber Monday sale is a great time to stock up on sportswear like sweatsuits, T-shirts, hoodies, and jackets. You'll also find accessories like socks, duffle bags, gloves, and more.</p><h2>How does Nike stand up to the competition on Cyber Monday?</h2><p>Although you will find Nike products on sale at plenty of other retailers, shopping directly through Nike is usually the best place to find deals on the brand.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa47bf01df1d50018219306?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"851503810c4fe0c0bcd9adbf6da39af3","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-39-297_9ce650df2d4a52da.webp","destWidth":1667,"destHeight":1250,"sourceBytes":90524,"destBytes":90524,"author":"insider@insider.com (Sarah Saril,Jen Gushue)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fc27392037cbd0018612bb1?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn94@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-46-880_b2d5de8d07aab24b.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fbed108037cbd0018612702?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn17@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-41-225_eda23d87f1eca0be.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f2b08b57924a11256058c1a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn46@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-47-666_64826e8e0834d21a.webp","https://i.insider.com/5e4d859804389533fd2ad972?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn65@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-52-065_3838324f8b9f86e6.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f2d9cf8f0f419061a2e9e2a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn95@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-39-842_f517de863023b912.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fc0a5f2037cbd001861287f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn30@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-46-272_544cf86fcb3e89f4.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fbed21d037cbd001861270a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn38@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-59-186_98f265dbb006490a.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f0741ff191824332041f233?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn50@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-51-872_373c8b3098e02cf0.webp","https://i.insider.com/5ddea0e3fd9db27a442b6ee9?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn21@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-56-143_45d5491b9e39a412.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dcd748d7eece53e0a702958?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn25@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-46-124_e799760b580eb4dd.webp","https://i.insider.com/5eb45f3c5f726e071d0690e4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn69@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-52-116_fb8c334a3b7ea78d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fc0a7e6037cbd0018612880?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-57-026_0d2baaa274cff43e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=l12otLRuMRA:3F6TT49-3zM:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn39@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-58-531_5ee201a7299e0916.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=l12otLRuMRA:3F6TT49-3zM:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn65@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-46-708_3f33ce618d8d8304.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=l12otLRuMRA:3F6TT49-3zM:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn13@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-40-314_68554995aec9cc34.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/l12otLRuMRA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn37@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-46-359_f3be58b939657f15.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719550},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"All major battleground states in the 2020 election officially certify their results, cementing Biden's victory in the presidential race","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/6-key-battleground-states-finalize-election-results-for-joe-biden-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fbe8d0150e71a0011557612?format=jpeg\" alt=\"election 2020 voting\" height=\"1100\" width=\"2200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Demonstrators in midtown Manhattan on November 4 demanded that every vote be counted before a state was &#34;called&#34; for a candidate.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Erik McGregor/LightRocket via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>All the key battleground states in the 2020 presidential election have now certified their election results, cementing President-elect Joe Biden's victory over President Donald Trump.&#160;</li>\n<li>The six battlegrounds of Arizona, Georgia, Michigan, Nevada, Pennsylvania, and Wisconsin certified their results for Biden as of November 30.&#160;</li>\n<li>The canvassing and certification came under a national spotlight because of the efforts from Trump and his allies to challenge the election results in court and spread baseless claims of widespread voter fraud.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>All the key battleground states in the 2020 presidential race have now certified their election results, cementing President-elect Joe Biden's victory over President Donald Trump.</p><p>Biden <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/2020-election-results\">won the Electoral College</a> with 306 electoral votes, compared with 232 for Trump. The former vice president flipped five states that Trump won in 2016: the \"blue wall\" states of Michigan, Pennsylvania, and Wisconsin; Arizona, which a Democratic presidential candidate had not carried since 1996; and Georgia, which a Democratic presidential candidate hadn't won since 1992.</p><p>After all the votes come in, election officials thoroughly canvass the votes cast before elected officials can be seated.&#160;</p><p>During the canvassing process, local election officials process and adjudicate provisional ballots and, in many states, late-arriving domestic mail ballots and absentee ballots from overseas and military voters. In some states, the canvassing process can also include mandatory audits or recounts. Once every vote is properly accounted for, officials then certify the results.</p><p>In most elections, the canvassing and certification process doesn't receive much public attention or scrutiny. But in 2020, the actions and decisions of local officials and canvassing boards <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-team-trying-to-block-election-certification-in-swing-states-2020-11\">were thrust into the national spotlight</a> because of the efforts from Trump and his allies to challenge the election results in court and spread unfounded claims of widespread voter fraud, as well as election irregularities in the states that the president lost.</p><p>Georgia <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/georgia-secretary-of-state-certifies-biden-won-election-2020-11\">certified its election results on November 20 after completing a statewide risk-limiting audit</a>, the first of its kind in the South, in which election workers recounted by hand over 5 million ballots that confirmed Biden's narrow victory over Trump. After certification, the Trump campaign also requested a machine recount, which is expected to finish up this week.</p><p>Michigan's Board of State Canvassers then <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/michigan-canvassing-board-certifies-election-results-for-joe-biden-2020-11\">certified the state's results for Biden on November 23</a> after hearing nearly three hours of public comment. One day later, the two battleground states of Pennsylvania and Nevada also certified their statewide presidential results.</p><p>Arizona's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/arizona-certifies-election-as-trump-team-holds-event-on-voter-fraud-2020-11\">governor certified the state's election results on Monday</a> as Trump allies including Rudy Giuliani held a press conference where they continued to push unfounded claims of fraud and malfeasance in the election.</p><p>The chairwoman of the Wisconsin Election Commission on Monday <a href=\"https://www.jsonline.com/story/news/politics/elections/2020/11/30/showdown-over-finalizing-wisconsins-presidential-results/6465419002/\">confirmed Biden as the winner of the state's 10 Electoral College votes</a>, and Gov. Tony Evers <a href=\"https://twitter.com/GovEvers/status/1333548866554142720\">officially certified the results</a> that evening. The Trump campaign requested recounts in Milwaukee and Dane counties, both of which affirmed Biden's victory in the state <a href=\"https://www.npr.org/sections/biden-transition-updates/2020/11/28/939645865/biden-gains-votes-in-recount-of-milwaukee-county-requested-by-trump\">and netted Biden 87 votes</a>.</p><p>The battleground states that Trump won, including Florida, Iowa, Ohio, and North Carolina, have also formally certified their results.</p><p><strong><em>Read more:</em>&#160;</strong><em><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-get-job-biden-administration-white-house-hiring-career-2020-11?r=oo-kush\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\" data-qa=\"message_attachment_title_link\">Joe Biden is hiring about 4,000 political staffers to work in the White House and federal agencies. Here's how you can boost your chances getting a job in the new administration, according to 3 experts.</a></em></p><p>Trump and his allies lost over two dozen lawsuits they filed to halt vote counting, get certain ballots disqualified, and delay certification of election results in the battleground states that Trump lost, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-campaign-lawsuits-election-results-2020-11\">according to Insider's Jacob Shamsian and Sonam Sheth</a>.</p><p>Then the Trump campaign and the president's allies <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-team-trying-to-block-election-certification-in-swing-states-2020-11\">pivoted to attempting to compel state and local officials to delay certifying the results of the election</a>. While many states allow campaigns to request recounts after certification, it's much harder for campaigns to legally challenge election results after states have certified those results.&#160;</p><p>The next step in the process of Biden taking over the presidency is for the entire slate of presidential electors to meet and cast their votes in every state and the District of Columbia on December 14.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/6-key-battleground-states-finalize-election-results-for-joe-biden-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a (Grace Panetta)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fbe8d0150e71a0011557612?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn25@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-57-500_559879819e5a1780.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JGl7YJEknQc:I5cKeNAcaCc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn62@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-56-553_6c750cd44a31db8b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JGl7YJEknQc:I5cKeNAcaCc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn23@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-39-427_a43194030523af62.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JGl7YJEknQc:I5cKeNAcaCc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn29@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-59-313_79f9230b8ac2f94d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/JGl7YJEknQc":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn10@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-57-164_3d12d819e0cff913.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719443},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Gov. Newsom considers another COVID-19 stay-at-home order as hospitalizations in California spike after Thanksgiving holiday","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/newsom-stay-at-home-order-hospitalizations-in-california-spike-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc583eb50e71a0011558177?format=jpeg\" alt=\"gavin newsom\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Gov. Gavin Newsom announces new criteria related to coronavirus hospitalizations and testing that could allow counties to open faster than the state, during a news conference at Mustards Grill in Napa, Calif., Monday May 18, 2020. Newsom says the new criteria could apply to 53 of the state&#39;s 58 counties.\n<p class=\"copyright\">AP Photo/Rich Pedroncelli</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>California Gov. Gavin Newsom said he is considering imposing another stay-at-home order as hospitalizations in the state spike amid COVID-19 surges.</li>\n<li>About 75% of California's 7,733 ICU beds are occupied, and hospitals could reach 112% of capacity by December 24, according to projections shared by Newsom.</li>\n<li>\"If these trends continue, we're going to have to take much more dramatic &#8212; arguably drastic &#8212; actions,\" he said during a briefing Monday.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>California Gov. Gavin Newsom said Monday that he is considering imposing another stay-at-home order as hospitals could be overwhelmed by Christmas amid COVID-19 spikes, projections show.</p><p>The potential orders could impact counties in the purple tier of the state's reopening plan, which are under the strictest guidelines. Fifty-one counties are in the purple tier out of 58 counties in total.</p><p>\"If these trends continue, we're going to have to take much more dramatic — arguably drastic — actions,\" he said during a briefing Monday.</p><p>California, the US' most populous state, became <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/california-the-second-state-to-pass-1-million-covid-19-cases-1029800981\">the second US state to pass the grim milestone of one million COVID-19 cases</a> confirmed in the state, Texas was the first state.</p><p>About 75% of California's 7,733 ICU beds are occupied, and hospitals could reach 112% of capacity by December 24, according to projections shared by Newsom. The state reported <a href=\"https://public.tableau.com/views/COVID-19HospitalsDashboard/Hospitals?:embed=y&:showVizHome=noe=no\">7,787 coronavirus hospitalizations</a> as of Sunday — an 89% spike in hospitalizations over the last two weeks.</p><p>Dr. Mark Ghaly, California's health and human services secretary, told <a href=\"https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-11-30/california-covid-coronavirus-restrictions-hospitalizations-at-record-levels\">the Los Angeles Times</a> that the hospitalization figures don't show the entire picture of the spread of COVID-19 in the state, as hospitalizations only account for developed cases that were detected a few weeks earlier.</p><p>\"[Everything] is on the table in terms of considering how we effectively guide the state through this,\" Ghaly told the LA Times.</p><p>The state imposed a <a href=\"http://www.publichealth.lacounty.gov/phcommon/public/media/mediapubhpdetail.cfm?prid=2830\">\"targeted safer-at-home order\"</a> following Thanksgiving, which closed public playgrounds, set a capacity on non-essential establishments, and prohibited gatherings between people from different households except outdoor religious services and protests.</p><p>\"We have come to a place where our cases and our hospitalizations are so high that we must do something to settle things down,\" Dr. Sara Cody, the health officer for Santa Clara County, said Saturday upon announcing the new targeted restrictions. \"We are now at a critical inflection point.\"</p><p>\"This pandemic is like a high-speed train, and our projections tell us that we are on target to derail by around the third week of December if we don't apply brakes, right now, with all our collective might,\" she continued. \"We urge everyone to stay home to the greatest extent that you can. Please stay home. Do not go out unless it is for essential reasons or essential purposes.\"</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/newsom-stay-at-home-order-hospitalizations-in-california-spike-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a Whether you're interested in Apple's standard AirPods or the noise-canceling AirPods Pro, deals are still available on all models.&#160;</p><p>Although the best deal on the AirPods Pro quickly sold out, you can still get Apple's top-of-the-line wireless headphones at a bargain price.&#160;</p><p>Both the AirPods with the wireless charging case and the ones with a normal wired plug-in charging case are on sale. Due to their popularity, ease of use, and good sound, we consider the AirPods to be among the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-tech-deals-sales\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best Cyber Monday tech deals </a>you can get right now.</p><p>The standard AirPods have a stem-like design that looks like the normal wired earbuds Apple used to include in the box with new iPhones. They're meant to fit anyone, so they are not adjustable and the fit is a bit looser than earbuds with ear tips.</p><p>The AirPods are powered by Apple's H1 chip, which makes for effortless pairing and an easy user experience. The battery is rated to provide five hours of playback on one charge, and the charging case can give you about 24 hours of extra power. The charging case comes in two versions: one that charges up by plugging in with a lightning cable and another that can also charge wirelessly.</p><p>Below, we've listed the top <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-airpods-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday AirPod deals</a> you can find on every AirPod model. Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><h2>How do we choose the best deals from Best Buy?</h2><ul><li>We only choose products that meet our high standard of coverage, from brands we've tested and trust.</li><li>We compare the prices against other retailers like Amazon, Target, and Walmart and only include the deals that are the same or better (not including promotional discounts that come from using certain credit cards).</li><li>We research price history thoroughly to ensure that every deal we list is actually worth your time.</li></ul><h2>When is Cyber Monday 2020?</h2><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday 2020</a> takes place on November 30. It's a bit different than <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Black Friday</a>; as the name suggests, Cyber Monday sales are typically online-only, whereas Black Friday also includes in-store discounts. The discounted products are generally the same, though Cyber Monday leans a bit more tech, and you can snag equally exceptional deals both days.</p><h2>Can I order online and pick up in-store?</h2><p>Best Buy offers both in-store and curbside pickup for online orders. Just select the option that works best for you when adding to your cart to knock off any extra shipping costs and, sometimes, expedite your order's arrival. You'll need your ID, the credit card used for the purchase, and order number when you get to the store. To prevent the spread of COVID-19, you must also wear a face-covering to enter the store to pick your order up.&#160;</p><p>Here are the options:</p><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/shop-confidently/curbside-pickup-returns-frequently-asked-questions/pcmcat1586201166795.c?id=pcmcat1586201166795\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Contactless Curbside Pickup</a>: Keep contact to a minimum by selecting this option at checkout; you'll receive step-by-step instructions via email to receive your order as smoothly as possible, all from the safety of your car.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/help-topics/store-pickup/pcmcat204400050014.c?id=pcmcat204400050014\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Fast Store Pickup</a>: Or just store pickup at checkout, you can get your order as soon as within an hour of placing it.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/customer-service/fast-store-pickup/pcmcat218900050012.c?id=pcmcat218900050012\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Free shipping to stores</a>: If the item you're ordering is out of stock at your local Best Buy, you can have it shipped to your store for pickup, free.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/customer-service/fast-store-pickup/pcmcat218900050012.c?id=pcmcat218900050012\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Friends and Family Pickup</a>: Send a gift to a loved one via your closest Best Buy location or have someone you trust pick your order up for you with this option. Shipping to store is still free.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/home-appliances/warehouse-pickup/pcmcat1547493805250.c?id=pcmcat1547493805250\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Warehouse Pickup</a>: For larger purchases like home appliances, select warehouse pickup to avoid scheduling conflicts and heavy shipping costs by picking your order up straight from the warehouse. Most metropolitan areas have a Best Buy Warehouse nearby; find a warehouse (it'll say in the name) near you <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/store-locator/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">here</a>.</li></ul><h2>What should I buy from Best Buy during Cyber Monday?</h2><p>The discounts you should expect from Best Buy this Cyber Monday are very similar to those you can hope to see during <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Black Friday</a>. It leans heavily on tech: TVs, audio gear, smart home accessories, gaming peripherals and the like are all deeply discounted over Cyber Monday.</p><p>If you're planning to buy a TV, do so on Cyber Monday. We're already seeing notable drops, like $500 off the <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1725162403278312790\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">75-inch LG NanoCell 80</a>, $1,000 off the <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1725162447875177469\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">65-inch Sony A8H OLED</a>, and $70 off the <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1725162514292663303\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">32-inch Insignia HD Fire TV</a>. This year, we expect to see the same range of TVs on sale; no matter your budget or size requirements, you're sure to find something that fits your needs this Cyber Monday.</p><p><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1722185630705684156\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Headphones and speakers</a> always drop to notable lows during the event, and 2020 should be no different. Whether you're looking for earbuds, Bluetooth headphones, portable speakers, home theater soundbars, or bookshelf speakers this year, so long as you can hold out til Cyber Monday rolls around, you can find a solid deal.&#160;</p><p>Though typically less pricey a purchase than something like a TV, <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1722185752960877728\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">PC and gaming peripherals</a> always fall to lows on Cyber Monday. Gaming mice, keyboards, headsets, and SSDs from brands like Logitech, Razer, HyperX, and Samsung see deep discounts every year during the event, so don't miss out if you're looking for something specific.</p><h2>What is My Best Buy?</h2><p><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1722008231980236173\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">My Best Buy</a> is the free program offered by the retailer that can get you some <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1722185499986046988\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">extra discounts and perks</a>, members only. Some of the perks include, but aren't limited to, early deal access and the <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1722008219602849156\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Black Friday price guarantee</a> going on now. You don't need to be signed up to shop the deals, but if you're planning to shop from Best Buy at all this Cyber Monday, it's worth signing up — it's free.&#160;</p><h2>Which is better, Black Friday or Cyber Monday?</h2><p>This year, with most shopping taking place online, the difference between the two days will be less distinct — in-store exclusives will be a thing of the past as buyers stay home and opt for safety. Both days will offer exceptional savings, of that you can be sure.&#160;</p><p>If you're worried about encountering buyers' remorse amongst the flurry of discounts, don't fret; when buying through one of our posts, you can be sure you're getting an actually good deal (and we'll always include details so you can make the most informed purchase possible). As a rule of thumb, it's always safe to buy a deal on either Black Friday or Cyber Monday themselves, especially if we note that it's a new low.</p><p>Cyber Monday 2020 takes place on November 30. It's a bit different than Black Friday; as the name suggests, Cyber Monday sales are typically online-only, whereas Black Friday also includes in-store discounts. The discounted products are generally the same, though Cyber Monday leans a bit more tech, and you can snag equally exceptional deals both days.</p><h2>How do I make a return to Best Buy?</h2><p>You may need to return a product for a variety of reasons and as long as you have a receipt, Best Buy will offer your money back. Like many major retailers, Best Buy is offering an extended return policy, but there are exceptions. See our guide on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-return-online-orders\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">how to return a purchase you made online</a>.</p><div stories</strong></a><strong>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>Chatri Sityodtong started ONE Championship, Asia's largest mixed martial arts promotion in 2011. ONE's livestreams reach billions of viewers and now have American broadcasters seeking to show his content in Western markets. Sityodtong prides himself on having the best fighters that also serve as role models for the millions of young fans following them.</p><p>\"Every human being on the planet wants to celebrate wholesome values like integrity, humility, honor, respect, courage, discipline, compassion, the true martial arts values heroes,\" he told Business Insider.</p><p>This January he will host the newest edition of the reality television show \"The Apprentice.\"&#160; With more than 30 different versions, \"The Apprentice: ONE Championship\" will be the first with an MMA component.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/ceo-of-one-championship-martial-arts-values-on-the-apprentice-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/zZS5rPHINjI\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 30 Nov 2020 22:41:27 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fc179cd037cbd0018612b1a?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"bf97d4b8226e1e66cfbe852e56dce2d2","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn33@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-39-199_c87c3b099045b419.webp","destWidth":1440,"destHeight":1080,"sourceBytes":58986,"destBytes":58986,"author":"kreilly@businessinsider.com (Kevin Reilly,Daniel T. Allen)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://media.tbistatic.com/bistudios/_00/dev/ING/story_banners/ING_edit_banner.png?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn17@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-45-761_39f0bb5650c64aec.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn61@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-59-557_f31273f7a5246fcc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn70@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-53-625_9ff37414b4fa8370.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zZS5rPHINjI:xxE5RqPvFjo:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn42@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-42-471_bee59dab497d6be1.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/zZS5rPHINjI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn53@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-59-403_5fb8fcadb13125cc.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719428},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"E-COMMERCE ENTREPRENEURSHIP: How to make six figures selling products online through dropshipping","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-become-a-dropshipper-tips-for-getting-into-ecommerce-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc1783950e71a0011557c45?format=jpeg\" alt=\"dropshipping 2x1\" height=\"1200\" width=\"2401\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Samantha Lee/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>E-commerce is a growing sector of retail, as well as a burgeoning market for individuals looking to make money by selling products online.</li>\n<li>Dropshipping is a form of e-commerce selling in which the seller doesn't have to invest in inventory, so the start-up costs are low.</li>\n<li>Dropshipping can be done from anywhere, as a side-hustle or a full-time career.</li>\n<li>Business Insider has spoken to and vetted various e-commerce experts to put together a list of resources for people interested in starting dropshipping, or growing their existing business.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>E-commerce is bigger than ever and it's only getting bigger. Today, it's not uncommon to shop on Instagram or buy products from companies you've never heard of directly off your phone. These trends aren't just good news for retail companies, they've also created an exploding market for individuals looking to make money through e-commerce, either as a side gig or full-time job.</p><p>Many entrepreneurs use a product fulfillment method called \"dropshipping\" where they don't have to invest in inventory in order to sell items online. Dropshipping successfully can lead to six-figure sales — in fact, Business Insider has spoken with sellers who have sold more than $1 million of a single product.</p><h2><strong>So what exactly is dropshipping?</strong>&#160;</h2><p>Dropshipping is a fulfillment method for online sales. It means the seller doesn't hold any inventory and essentially acts as a middleman between the customer and the supplier or manufacturer.&#160;</p><p>The role of the seller — or dropshipper — is to market retail products and find potential buyers. First, they create an online store for the product (many dropshippers use Shopify to do this), and then they design ads and buy ad placements on social media platforms.</p><p>When a product is sold, it gets shipped straight from the supplier to the customer. Often, dropshippers work with suppliers in China through wholesale marketplaces like Alibaba. Because the seller doesn't have to spend money on inventory, they can run their business from anywhere and the startup costs are relatively low. To start selling a product, dropshippers need to pay for a Shopify subscription, as well as for the product ads they run on Facebook or Google that drive shoppers back to their Shopify store.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc15a31037cbd0018612a99?format=jpeg\" alt=\"how dropshipping no inventory selling works\" height=\"1722\" width=\"2401\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Samantha Lee/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>There are tons of dropshipping tutorial videos on YouTube. But some dropship \"mentors\" out there make more money from selling courses than they do from actual dropshipping — and use YouTube content to portray a false sense of success<strong>.</strong> Luckily, Business Insider has interviewed and vetted dropshippers and industry experts to give our readers only the most trusted, useful information on the topic.&#160;</p><p>Below are some resources that guide e-commerce entrepreneurs through everything from setting up a store and scaling their business to the overall global impact of dropshipping.</p><p><strong>This is <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dropshipper-made-17-million-this-year-shares-e-commerce-tips-2020-9?r=dropshipping-lp\">how dropshipping works</a>, its advantages, and how to set up your own store</strong></p><p>Kamil Sattar began dropshipping in 2017 using Shopify to set up online stores and sell products. Sattar recommends focusing on selling one product and making your store and branding look legitimate, because today's consumer has high standards for professionality when shopping online. Using additional apps and tools to automate aspects of your business, like a customer service bot, can improve reach and help you move more products.</p><p>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dropshipper-made-17-million-this-year-shares-e-commerce-tips-2020-9?r=dropshipping-lp\">A 21-year-old is 'dripping in dropshipping money,' selling $1.7 million in products on Shopify this year. He shares his biggest tips for making e-commerce work for you.</a></p><p><strong>Here's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-toy-hamster-went-viral-and-made-dropshippers-1-million-2020-11?r=dropshipping-lp\">how to identify a winning product</a> and make it go viral</strong></p><p>Dropshippers thrive by finding \"niches,\" or categories of products, that are popular with consumers — like home goods, loungewear, or baby products. Brothers Steve and Evan Tan explain how to get in on a trend or niche early, which can lead to a product going viral and bringing in big money.</p><p>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-toy-hamster-went-viral-and-made-dropshippers-1-million-2020-11?r=dropshipping-lp\">Two brothers spotted a toy hamster in China and figured out how to make it a viral hit in the US, sparking over $1 million in sales. Here's the inside story of how it happened.</a></p><p><strong>Why <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dropshipping-marketplace-spocket-vets-suppliers-repeat-customers-2020-10?r=dropshipping-lp\">working with vetted suppliers</a> can improve customer experience</strong></p><p>Many dropshippers source their products on wholesale sites based in China, like Alibaba and AliExpress. Often these suppliers have long ship times and no return policy, which can lead to frustrated customers. Saba Mohebpour created an online wholesale marketplace called Spocket that includes US and European based suppliers, all of which are vetted for reliability, to help dropshippers improve their customer experience.</p><p>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dropshipping-marketplace-spocket-vets-suppliers-repeat-customers-2020-10?r=dropshipping-lp\">How dropshipping marketplace Spocket vets suppliers to help entrepreneurs gain repeat customers and compete with Amazon</a></p><p><strong>Advice on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-scale-dropship-business-from-side-gig-to-career-2020-10?r=dropshipping-lp\">smartly scaling your business</a> from side hustle to full-time gig</strong></p><p>Many dropshippers operate as solo entrepreneurs, which can limit the amount of stores they're able to operate. Steve and Evan Tan grew their company to more than 400 employees since they began dropshipping in 2016, and recommend investing in team members as a part of a plan to scale. If you try to scale without the infrastructure, it can lead to issues with everything from supplier communications to shipping to answering customer emails.</p><p>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-scale-dropship-business-from-side-gig-to-career-2020-10?r=dropshipping-lp\">This dropshipping duo sold $12 million in goods during their first full year in business. Here's what they say about scaling from a side hustle to a money-making machine.</a></p><p><strong>Why <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/5-tips-for-dropshippers-looking-to-elevate-their-web-presence-2020-10?r=dropshipping-lp\">dropshipping products you're passionate about</a> can help with long term success</strong></p><p>Moving from niche to niche is one way to dropship, but e-commerce and marketing expert Neil Patel says that focusing on one category you're really passionate about is better in the long run. Patel says that becoming an expert in your category and creating useful content and thought leadership requires emotional investment, and can help you establish a real presence.</p><p>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/5-tips-for-dropshippers-looking-to-elevate-their-web-presence-2020-10?r=dropshipping-lp\">An e-commerce mentor shares his top 5 strategies for sustaining a dropshipping career</a></p><p><strong>Why <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dropshipping-gives-major-retailers-huge-inventory-at-low-cost-2020-11?r=dropshipping-lp\">major retailers are also adopting dropshipping</a></strong></p><p>Dropshipping isn't just a method used by e-commerce entrepreneurs, it's also become a crucial method for big-name retailers to expand their online inventory. When retailers like Nordstrom and Kohl's create these deals with suppliers, the supplier gets the benefit of broader reach through the retailer's site, and the retailer doesn't have to buy inventory or use up warehouse space. An expert explains the pros and cons of these relationships.</p><p>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dropshipping-gives-major-retailers-huge-inventory-at-low-cost-2020-11?r=dropshipping-lp\">At least 40% of retailers use dropshipping to expand their online inventory and compete with Amazon — and those numbers will only grow, experts say</a></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-become-a-dropshipper-tips-for-getting-into-ecommerce-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a Preferred: Kohl's)</bi-shortcode><h2 id=\"cyber-monday-faqs\">Cyber Monday FAQs</h2><h3>When is Cyber Monday?</h3><p>Cyber Monday is the Monday following <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"6f373ef450cf753e61e0b3aa31ed093d\">Black Friday</a> every year. In 2020, the online-heavy shopping event hits Monday, November 30.</p><p>As an extension of sorts to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"6f373ef450cf753e61e0b3aa31ed093d\">Black Friday</a>, Cyber Monday gives you more time and opportunity to save on tech, home goods, kitchen appliances, clothing, and more that you might've missed immediately after Thanksgiving.</p><h3><strong>When does Cyber Monday end?</strong></h3><p>Technically, Cyber Monday ends at 11:59 p.m. EST on Monday, November 30. But many brands are extending their sales to Cyber Week, like Adidas who is offering 40% off site-wide through the end of Tuesday, then 30% off wite-wide for the rest of the week.&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wayfair-cyber-monday-deals\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"5fd6951467a498454e54538f2acbb841\">Wayfair's Cyber Monday deals</a>, meanwhile, will run through December 4.</p><h3>What should I buy during Cyber Monday?</h3><p>If a retailer offers Black Friday deals, it's a near guarantee that it will offer Cyber Monday deals, too.&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"fce71b4f6deb1a33848a00b54aa26202\">Amazon</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-cyber-monday\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"44dea4e0d8272806c98fa744d7861022\">Best Buy</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/target-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"f9c8850b2668b24c14c18c55594ac458\">Target</a>, and&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"a94a2a8a26e8d083ca27260c6885e4e0\">Walmart</a>&#160;are some noteworthy retailers that we know will participate in the shopping event.</p><p>We will likely see massive discounts on some of our favorite direct-to-consumer products during Cyber Monday, such as retail startups like&#160;<a href=\"http://leesa-sleep.lvuv.net/c/196318/236769/4014?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.leesa.com%2F&subid2=1606785549124aiqhpquh4&subId3=xid:fr1606785553462fdd53462fdd\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-orig-url=\"http://leesa-sleep.lvuv.net/c/196318/236769/4014?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.leesa.com%2F&subid2=1606785549124aiqhpquh4quh4\" data-ml-id=\"372\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1606785553462fdd\" data-uri=\"bcd1be2c8953b79592d696ad4a275176\">Leesa</a>&#160;and&#160;<a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=64892&urllink=www.brooklinen.com%2F&afftrack=1606785549124afcmuezb8|xid:fr1606785553462cab1606785553462cab\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-orig-url=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=64892&urllink=www.brooklinen.com%2F&afftrack=1606785549124afcmuezb85549124afcmuezb8\" data-ml-id=\"373\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1606785553462cab\" data-uri=\"d36c884df7b0e66babab021d8aa772dd\">Brooklinen</a>. For some, Cyber Monday (or Cyber Week) will be one of the few times of the year when their products see major markdowns.</p><h3>Will there be Cyber Monday shipping delays?</h3><p>Shipping delays and shopping holidays are inevitable. Experts say consumers should expect to see low inventory and shipping problems, during <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/holiday-shopping-2020-why-consumers-should-shop-early-2020-10\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"dfbc3878d06c91373bd2d3c7b9185efa\">Cyber Monday, Black Friday, and the weeks following</a>.&#160;</p><p>One way to avoid this: If you're buying online from a brick-and-mortar retailer like Walmart, Target, Best Buy, or Kohls, opt for in-store pickup and contactless curbside pickup. (If they don't have the item in stock, though, you'll likely still have to wait.)</p><h2 id=\"how-we-select-the-best-cyber-monday-deals\">How we select the best Cyber Monday deals</h2><ul><li>We only choose products that meet our high standard of coverage, and that we've either used ourselves or researched carefully.</li><li>We compare the prices among top retailers such as <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"fce71b4f6deb1a33848a00b54aa26202\">Amazon</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-cyber-monday\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"44dea4e0d8272806c98fa744d7861022\">Best Buy</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/target-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"f9c8850b2668b24c14c18c55594ac458\">Target</a>, and&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"a94a2a8a26e8d083ca27260c6885e4e0\">Walmart</a>&#160;and only include the deals that are better than all others offered (not including promotional discounts that come from using certain credit cards).</li><li>We limit deals to being at least 20% off, except on the occasion that products that are rarely discounted or provide an outsized value.</li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/last-minute-cyber-monday-deals-still-available-now-2020-11'>Business erx24/cdn26@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-49-960_a1970514dcb218e1.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f32abe8a6f0e12741416a4a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn22@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-51-459_37e5ff2aeaa8303d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5e611a5ba9f40c6f9e7637e2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn38@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-53-184_c9c85686e38c6e53.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fc5892d50e71a001155817e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn45@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-53-385_683a5b275bcc8d5b.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fc5802050e71a001155816a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn1@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-42-123_e953c2f19f1917fb.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=eQ1CwuAju9I:3d9KFQkU7t8:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn33@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-56-027_c366220fc724941c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=eQ1CwuAju9I:3d9KFQkU7t8:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn81@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-39-164_73aab347ae0c49c0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=eQ1CwuAju9I:3d9KFQkU7t8:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn49@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-43-928_72e7f43902ce6b38.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/eQ1CwuAju9I":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn59@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-39-686_74fc6266a5f163ed.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719491},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Tony Hsieh, the late former CEO of Zappos, famously pioneered the concept of paying new, unhappy employees $2,000 to quit in order to maintain a happy, productive workforce","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/zappos-tony-hsieh-paid-new-workers-to-quit-the-offer-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc55802037cbd0018612f60?format=jpeg\" alt=\"tony hsieh zappos\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tony Hsieh in Denver, Colorado, in June 2014.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Andy Cross/The Denver Post/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Tony Hsieh was the CEO of the online retailer Zappos for 20 years and pioneered a number of out-of-the-box work policies to foster innovation and productivity.</li>\n<li>One of them was \"The Offer,\" a program that offered new employees who decided they were unhappy a $2,000 bonus to quit following a four-week training period.</li>\n<li>The practice was designed to weed out those who wouldn't be as committed to and passionate about their work, thereby bolstering overall happiness in the company's workforce.</li>\n<li>\"We want to make sure that employees aren't here just for paychecks and truly believe this is the right place for them,\" Hsieh told <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tony-hsieh-explains-how-zappos-rebounded-from-employee-exodus-2016-1\">Business Insider's Rich Feloni in a 2016 interview.</a></li>\n<li>The former Zappos CEO announced his retirement from the company in August and died Saturday after sustaining injuries in a house fire.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Tony Hsieh, the late ex-CEO of online retailer Zappos, is known for his trailblazing workplace policies — including one in which the company offered up to $2,000 to unhappy new employees to leave the company, essentially bribing them to quit.</p><p>According to a <a href=\"https://hbr.org/2008/05/why-zappos-pays-new-employees\">2008 Harvard Business Review</a> article, Hsieh's \"The Offer\" program was a policy that entailed asking new employees if they'd like to quit following a four-week training period. If they chose to, Zappos would pay them a bonus on top of their full salary during their time worked at the company. The bonus rose over the years, with the company first offering $100 then $500, $1,000, and eventually, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tony-hsieh-explains-how-zappos-rebounded-from-employee-exodus-2016-1\">$2,000.&#160;</a></p><p>The practice was intended to weed out those who would not be as committed to and passionate about their work at the company.</p><p>\"We want to make sure that employees aren't here just for paychecks and truly believe this is the right place for them,\" Hsieh told <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tony-hsieh-explains-how-zappos-rebounded-from-employee-exodus-2016-1\">Business Insider's Rich Feloni in a 2016 interview.</a></p><p>Hsieh was known for his unusual workplace policies, including the practice of \"Holacracy,\" a system with a flat work hierarchy that allows employees to work without assigned roles and more flexibility as <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tony-hsieh-zappos-holacracy-company-culture-visionary-2020-11\">Business Insider's Avery Hartman</a> reported.&#160;He was the chief executive officer of Zappos for 20 years and announced his retirement from the company in August.</p><p>Hsieh <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tony-hsieh-ex-ceo-zappos-died-aged-46-2020-11\">died</a> Saturday at the age of 46 after sustaining injuries in a house fire in Connecticut. The cause of the fire is still under investigation.</p><p>In 2009, Hsieh sold Zappos to Amazon for $1.2 billion. Amazon inherited Hsieh's policy but put its own spin on it — the company offered full-time Amazon fulfillment center workers up to $5,000 to leave, per <a href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2018/05/21/why-amazon-pays-employees-5000-to-quit.html\">CNBC.</a> The policy, dubbed Pay to Quit, is designed to weed out the employees who decide they aren't happy at the company, subsequently improving workforce morale and productivity and ensuring that those who are employed are committed to their work.&#160;</p><p>As CNBC notes, the practice theoretically boosts productivity, which subsequently bolsters the company's income.</p><p>\"The goal is to encourage folks to take a moment and think about what they really want,\" Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos said in a 2014 <a href=\"https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1018724/000119312514137753/d702518dex991.htm\">letter</a> to shareholders.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/zappos-tony-hsieh-paid-new-workers-to-quit-the-offer-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=2VTgQC6MzIE:VjkenGEqibw:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=2VTgQC6MzIE:VjkenGEqibw:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/2VTgQC6MzIE\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 30 Nov 2020 21:56:19 top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>&#160;</p><h2 id=\"when-does-amazon's-black-friday-sale-start?\">When does Amazon's Cyber Monday sale start?</h2><p>Cyber Monday happens every year following the weekend after&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\" data-uri=\"6f373ef450cf753e61e0b3aa31ed093d\">Black Friday</a>. This year, the online-focused shopping holiday lands today, Monday, November 30. Cyber Monday sales started as early as Saturday morning after Black Friday.&#160;</p><p>We've seen some \"doorbusters\" released on Cyber Monday, with limited supplies. Though Cyber Monday sales once only took place on Monday, we'll likely see some deals last through the rest of the week.&#160;</p><h2 id=\"where-can-i-find-amazon's-black-friday-deals?\">Where can I find Amazon's Cyber Monday deals?</h2><p>Amazon's&#160;<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/cybermonday?tag=biip_112620_cyber-monday-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"243e9986b9cd54cdee82697420cc80dc\">Cyber Monday page</a> will be the place to check if you want to browse the retailer's holiday shopping discounts. Just like years past, Amazon will also be offering Alexa-exclusive deals that can be discovered by asking, \"Alexa, what are my deals?\"</p><h2 id=\"do-you-need-an-amazon-prime-membership-for-the-deals?\">Do you need an Amazon Prime membership for the deals?</h2><p>Unlike Amazon Prime Day, you don't need to be a Prime member to take advantage of Amazon's Black Friday deals. But you do get perks like faster delivery and exclusive deals if you sign up for Prime which costs $12.99 per month. It's a worthwhile option if you plan to do the bulk of your holiday shopping on Amazon and want the flexibility to order last-minute gifts.&#160;</p><ul><li>prime monthly subscription product card</li></ul><h2 id=\"how-do-we-select-the-best-black-friday-deals-at-amazon?\">How do we select the best Cyber Monday deals at Amazon?</h2><ul><li>We select products that meet our high standards of coverage from brands we've tested.</li><li>We research prices across retailers like Walmart, Target, and Best Buy and compare these against historical price drops to find the deals that are worth your time.</li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-cyber-monday-deals-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"
