href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/OfXIkHD1aYg\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 01 Dec 2020 03:30:51 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa47bf01df1d50018219306?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"944c5517bd395e31910e4357dd4f2ab8","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-39-297_9ce650df2d4a52da.webp","destWidth":1667,"destHeight":1250,"sourceBytes":90524,"destBytes":90524,"author":"simon@hillproductions.co.uk (Simon Hill)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fc51afd50e71a0011557f3c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn66@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-43-962_f8fe8495b10b7289.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn6@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-42-102_d8775c0d2742b58d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn21@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-59-202_d38fad667b8d8eb4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OfXIkHD1aYg:-arpcwrjKzc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn70@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-47-846_c1b5ce2a0bc8bd53.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/OfXIkHD1aYg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn61@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-42-647_968057421b793814.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719345},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Moderna just asked the FDA to authorize its coronavirus vaccine, a key step before it can be given to more people","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-covid-vaccine-emergency-use-authorization-fda-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f628f13323fc4001e0d6bdb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Moderna CEO Stephane Bancel\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Moderna CEO Stéphane Bancel at a meeting with President Donald Trump, members of the White House coronavirus task force, and pharmaceutical executives on March 2.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Andrew Harnik/AP Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li><strong>Moderna</strong>&#160;filed for emergency-use authorization of its experimental coronavirus vaccine, the company <a href=\"https://twitter.com/moderna_tx/status/1333530539781984259\">announced</a> on Monday.</li>\n<li>The biotech company said its vaccine was <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-vaccine-works-to-prevent-covid-19-company-says-2020-11\">94.1% effective against COVID-19</a> in an analysis of a late-stage trial.</li>\n<li>If the Food and Drug Administration authorizes the vaccine, the US intends to start vaccinating vulnerable people before the end of 2020.</li>\n<li><a href=\"http://newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/insider-healthcare\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">For more stories like this, sign up here for Business Insider's daily healthcare newsletter.</a></li>\n</ul><p>Moderna has asked US regulators to allow the emergency use of its coronavirus vaccine, starting a process that could allow the shot to be given more widely within weeks.</p><p>The biotech company filed for emergency-use authorization with the US Food and Drug Administration on Monday, it said in a <a href=\"https://twitter.com/moderna_tx/status/1333530539781984259\">statement</a>, about a week after Pfizer and BioNTech <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pfizer-coronavirus-vaccine-filed-for-emergency-authorization-with-fda-2020-11\">asked the FDA to authorize their vaccine</a>. The company is also seeking authorization from regulators in other countries.</p><p>Moderna said its vaccine was 94.1% effective at preventing COVID-19, the disease caused by the new coronavirus, in an analysis of 196 COVID-19 cases from a 30,000-person trial. The company <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-vaccine-works-to-prevent-covid-19-company-says-2020-11\">said on November 16</a> that the vaccine was 94.5% effective, in an earlier analysis from that trial.</p><p>\"We believe that our vaccine will provide a new and powerful tool that may change the course of this pandemic and help prevent severe disease, hospitalizations, and death,\" Moderna CEO Stéphane Bancel said in the statement.</p><p>Vaccines developed by Moderna and by Pfizer are likely to be the first immunizations that can help the US stop the COVID-19 pandemic. Pfizer has said its shot was 95% effective at preventing COVID-19. The US surpassed records for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-surpassed-116000-daily-new-covid-19-cases-breaking-record-2020-11\">coronavirus infections</a> and <a href=\"https://www.marketwatch.com/story/guid/be33bee0-24f3-11eb-8e8c-1960ba977108?siteid=rss&rss=1ss=1\">COVID-19 hospitalizations</a> in November. More than a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/at-least-250000-americans-have-already-died-from-covid-19-2020-11\">quarter of a million Americans</a> have died from COVID-19.</p><p>AstraZeneca and the University of Oxford shared preliminary data on their coronavirus vaccine last week, saying it appeared to have 70% efficacy. That figure was an average of results from two different dosing combinations, however, prompting <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/astrazeneca-oxford-coronavirus-vaccine-news-problems-questions-data-2020-11\">outside experts to raised questions about the data</a>. The US is unlikely to authorize that vaccine until an ongoing trial concludes.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-vaccine-moderna-jj-plan-pediatric-trials-2020-9?r=aa-sub\">Coronavirus-vaccine frontrunner Moderna is planning to start testing its shot in kids — a crucial step to halting the pandemic</a></em></p><p>Bancel previously <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-vaccine-works-to-prevent-covid-19-company-says-2020-11\">told Business Insider</a> it was too soon to compare Moderna's vaccine with Pfizer's, but he said they were both \"excellent vaccines that are going to help a lot of Americans and help a lot of people around the world.\"</p><p>He said he anticipated every American having access to vaccines by late May. In the meantime, he said wearing masks and practicing social distancing were the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-ceo-vaccines-are-not-silver-bullet-must-wear-masks-2020-11\">\"best weapon\" to stop the coronavirus</a> from spreading.</p><p>\"Even if no other vaccines were going to make it, as a worst-case scenario, I think by Memorial Day, end of June, any Americans who want a vaccine will have their hands on a vaccine,\" Bancel told <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-vaccine-works-to-prevent-covid-19-company-says-2020-11\">Business Insider's Andrew Dunn</a>.</p><h2>Independent experts will carefully review trial data to determine whether the vaccine is ready for the public</h2><p>The company said side effects from the vaccine were typically mild or moderate. Some volunteers developed severe side effects from Moderna's vaccine, but <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-vaccine-works-to-prevent-covid-19-company-says-2020-11\">they were not life-threatening</a>. Common severe side effects included fatigue, injection-site pain, and headaches.</p><p>Moderna also said the vaccine was highly effective at preventing severe cases of COVID-19. The company said there were 30 cases of severe disease in the trial, all in people who got the placebo.</p><p>Getting a vaccine may not prevent people from spreading the virus to others. Volunteers were not tested for coronavirus unless they developed symptoms, meaning asymptomatic trial participants could still have gotten the disease and infected others.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/analysis-how-much-you-could-earn-at-moderna-vaccine-trial-2020-11?r=aa-sub\">Moderna salaries revealed: From $60,000 to $250,000, here's how much you could make at the biotech firm that recently announced a successful COVID-19 vaccine</a></em></p><p>Once Moderna files for emergency-use authorization, the FDA will conduct a rigorous review of the trial data to ensure the vaccine is safe for the public.</p><p>Peter Marks, an FDA director leading the vaccine vetting process, said career scientists and independent experts would analyze the data in a publicly broadcast meeting, which is scheduled for December 17.</p><p>That group, known as an advisory committee, will then vote on whether to recommend that the FDA authorize the vaccine. The FDA could decide whether to allow emergency use of the vaccine shortly after that.</p><p>Marks said he hoped letting the public see the authorization process unfold would <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/fdas-peter-marks-on-the-coronavirus-vaccine-review-process-2020-11\">build trust in the authorized vaccine</a>.</p><h2>The US needs to address challenges transporting and properly administering the vaccine once it becomes available</h2><p>Once the FDA authorizes a vaccine, the US intends to move quickly with getting vulnerable people access to the shot.</p><p>The US has <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/operation-warp-speed-us-coronavirus-vaccine-program-pfizer-moderna-2020-11\">already bought 100 million doses</a> of Moderna's vaccine, and it has the option of buying 400 million additional ones.</p><p>Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar has said he expects to start giving vaccines to the most vulnerable populations, like healthcare workers, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/alex-azar-vaccine-available-for-all-americans-spring-2021-2020-10\">by the end of the year</a>. Azar said he expected the general public to have access to a vaccine by April.</p><p>But ensuring the vaccines get properly transported and administered won't be easy.</p><p>The process to transport Moderna's vaccine has some advantages over Pfizer's. Moderna's shots can be stored in a fridge for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-vaccine-not-as-cold-as-pfizer-2020-11\">up to a month</a>, while Pfizer's vaccine lasts only five days in a vaccine fridge. Pfizer's shot additionally needs to be shipped out on dry ice <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moderna-coronavirus-vaccine-not-as-cold-as-pfizer-2020-11\">in special GPS-tracked briefcases</a>.</p><p>Moderna's and Pfizer's vaccines require two shots given weeks apart, and some experts say getting 100% of vaccine recipients to return for a follow-up could be difficult. Vaccinating a vast majority of Americans is crucial to achieving herd-immunity protection. Dr. Anthony Fauci, the top US infectious-disease expert, recently said roughly 80% of the population must get vaccinated before the country returned to \"some degree of normalcy.\"</p><p>\"What I would like to see is the overwhelming majority of people get vaccinated so we can, essentially, really crush this outbreak,\" Fauci said in an interview with <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VuelWuYyUPc&feature=emb_titleitle\">The New York Times</a>. \"This is going to be a difficult task.\"</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday deals</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-deals-right-now-2020-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">live blogging the best sales</a> savings we were seeing on clothes, cookware, and video games from <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-2020-store-deals-2020-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">big-box Naturally, we wouldn't keep the good stuff to ourselves, so we've curated the deals we shopped that are still available.&#160;&#160;</p><h2><strong>Here are the Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals we bought that are still available to shop now:</strong></h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tOur Place Always Pan\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc5906d50e71a001155818b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"our place\" height=\"585\" width=\"780\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Our Place</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<div id=\"ProductCard_5e58118cfee23d17943a1ea5\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e58118cfee23d17943a1ea5&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>\"I already have an Always Pan, but I love and use it so much that I decided to get a second after seeing its excellent deal. It never goes on sale and the $50 discount is substantial for a startup.\" <strong>&#8212; Jada Wong, senior home and kitchen editor</strong></p>\n\tCoop Original Pillow\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5faf020c1c741f0019ac9ce1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"coop original pillow\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ellen Hoffman/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<div id=\"ProductCard_5cffcbab6fc92016c901a992\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5cffcbab6fc92016c901a992&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>\"I'd wanted to try this pillow after reading <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-pillow\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">our buying guide to the best pillows</a>, so when I saw that it was 20% off during Black Friday, I jumped on the deal. It hasn't arrived yet but I'm looking forward to sleeping on them after several night shifts covering Black Friday and Cyber Monday.\" <strong>&#8212; Jada Wong, senior home and kitchen editor</strong></p>\n\tBombas Women's Solids Ankle Socks\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc563a7037cbd0018612fbc?format=jpeg\" alt=\"bombas socks\" height=\"450\" width=\"600\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bombas</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<div id=\"ProductCard_5e5599d5fee23d67e620b8c2\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e5599d5fee23d67e620b8c2&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>\"My partner and I both asked for Bombas socks for Hanukkah and Christmas, and being the professional deal hunters we are, we sent the links to our parents during Black Friday so they could get a sweet discount on our presents.</p><p>Bombas rarely go on sale, so this is a really good time to take advantage. id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><p>Today's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday</a> event may be coming to an end, and even though we didn't see deals on Apple products from Apple itself, plenty of retailers offered discounts on AirPods, Macs, iPhones, iPads, Apple Watches, and more, including <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-cyber-monday\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Best Buy</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/target-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Target</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Amazon</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Walmart</a>. And, many of these deals are still available.</p><p>Since many retailers posted their Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals early, discounts on popular items like the iPad Pro sold out quickly. But there are still plenty of savings on Apple computers, wearables, tablets, phones, and more.&#160;</p><p>Here are the best deals on Apple tech today on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday</a>. We'll be updating this article as more deals appear (and disappear). For more discounts, you can find the best <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-tech-deals-sales\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"5be2e7169c0b2a5c4f21deafbcc084ef\">Cyber Monday tech deals here</a>. You can also&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-deals-right-now-2020-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"8844f35c77b56b679e0fcf2a2524e1d9\">check out our Cyber Monday liveblog</a>&#160;for deal highlights throughout the day.&#160;</p><h2>The best Cyber Monday deals on Apple Watches</h2><h3>Apple Watch Series 6</h3><p>Apple's most advanced new smartwatch is on sale today for Cyber Monday. The Series 6 is the first watch to come with the ability to read blood oxygen levels, although that feature alone isn't what makes it a worthwhile smartwatch. Its brighter always-on display, faster charging, and wellness features such as the ability to take an ECG from the wrist make it a great choice for those looking for robust health tracking in a smartwatch.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc3a4eb19a2461eb656fd05\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">Watch Series 6 (44mm, GPS) (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-watch-series-6-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read our Apple Watch Series 6 review</a></h3><h3><strong>Apple Watch Series 5</strong></h3><p>The Apple Watch Series 5 is still a fantastic smartwatch that's a bit more capable than the Series SE but at a cheaper price than the Series 6. It has an always-on display and the ability to take an ECG from the wrist — two features that are missing from the SE. It lacks other new health features like blood oxygen measurements, but still offers many of Apple's other health-oriented features.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5fc1cc87f41f587aff2f41f8\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5fc1cc87f41f587aff2f41f8&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h3>Apple Watch SE</h3><p>If you're looking to spend a little less, consider the Apple Watch SE. Apple's lower-priced watch comes with all of the basic functionality of the Series 6, but without blood oxygen monitoring, an always-on display, and ECG monitoring. But, it still has other more modern features like a compass and the ability to detect hard falls.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5f848449bf96b920706aaf85\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5f848449bf96b920706aaf85&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-watch-se-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read our Apple Watch SE review</a></h3><h3><strong>Apple Watch Series 3</strong></h3><p>The Apple Watch Series 3 came out in 2017, but it's still a solid smartwatch for those who just want the basic Apple Watch experience. It lacks an always-on display, has a slightly smaller screen compared to the SE and Series 6, and doesn't come with a built-in compass or fall detection like its pricier siblings. But, it still works great for those who just want an Apple Watch for monitoring activity and delivering smartphone notifications to the wrist.&#160;</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5d35e177100a24190c405c8a\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5d35e177100a24190c405c8a&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>Best Buy is only offering the option to find a store for the model below, so you'll have to check with your local store to see if it's available.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5fb6ef2ad2a0a4191f26c616\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5fb6ef2ad2a0a4191f26c616&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2>The best Cyber Monday deals on AirPods</h2><h3>Apple AirPods Pro</h3><p>Apple's top-of-the-line AirPods are available at a discount this holiday season. Compared to Apple's standard AirPods, the Pro model offers active noise cancellation, improved audio, and customizable ear tips. They may not be <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-wireless-earbuds\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">our top pick overall</a> when it comes to wireless earbuds, but the AirPods Pro are the best choice for Apple fans, especially now that they're been updated with new features like spatial audio. They're a bargain at $200, but the lowest we've seen them sell for was <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-airpods-black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">$169 at Walmart</a>.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5dced9a33afd3779e6204628\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">AirPods Pro (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><h3>Apple AirPods (second generation)</h3><p>Looking to spend a little less? Apple's standard AirPods are on sale for Cyber Monday today, too. These AirPods still offer convenient features like quick pairing, hands-free Siri access, and automatic playing and pausing, but without the Pro's more advanced features and higher price tag.&#160;</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5de929a6fd9db24d5325b96b\" data-purchase-option=\"Best Buy\">Airpods with Wired Charging Case (Newest model) (medium, Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><div id=\"ProductCard_5d9b661d55824d3038090890\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5d9b661d55824d3038090890&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2>The best Cyber Monday deals on iPad</h2><h3><strong>Apple iPad Mini</strong></h3><p>Apple's smallest tablet is an ideal option for Apple fans that prioritize portability above all else in a tablet. The latest model comes with support for Apple Pencil and runs on Apple's A12 Bionic processor, the same chip that powers the latest entry-level iPad. But unlike its cheaper sibling, the iPad Mini comes with a fully laminated anti-reflective display, more storage space, and a camera that can capture wide color and Live Photos, making it a solid choice for those looking for a compact tablet with a quality screen and camera.&#160;</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5d9224472e22af468b47d846\" data-purchase-option=\"Best Buy\">iPad Mini (2019) (medium, Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><p>&#160;</p><h2>The best Cyber Monday deals on iPhone 12</h2><p>Carriers have been offering deals since the iPhone 12 launched, but more discounts are surfacing now that Cyber Monday is here today. The iPhone 12 lineup are Apple's first smartphones to come with 5G, but that's not the main characteristic that makes them worthwhile. The phones also offer a boost in camera quality that makes them better at taking photos in dark circumstances, and come with a refreshed design with a more durable screen.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f89a73f5146726a50681904\" data-purchase-option=\"Walmart\">iPhone 12 Mini (medium, Preferred: Walmart)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f89a26cacfefb515e553a63\" data-purchase-option=\"Walmart\">iPhone 12 (medium, Preferred: Walmart)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f89a4627be3a47c0b621176\" data-purchase-option=\"Walmart\">iPhone 12 Pro (medium, Preferred: Walmart)</bi-shortcode><p>If you are interested in what carriers have to offer, take a look at these discounts below. Just be sure to note that these bargains come with stipulations, like opening a new line or trading in an old device.</p><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.t-mobile.com/offers/apple-iphone-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">T-Mobile</a> is offering a free iPhone 12 or 12 Mini when you join and trade in an eligible device.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/1606737955687avjzn46w6-xid-fr1606737960185jgf/https://www.verizon.com/smartphones/apple-iphone-12/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Verizon</a> is offering a buy one, get one up to $800 off for those who buy any of Apple's new iPhones on a monthly payment plan with an eligible data plan.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.att.com/deals/iphone-deals/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">AT&#38;T</a> is offering a $700 discount on iPhones when you add a new line, upgrade an existing line, and trade-in a smartphone valued at $95 or more.</li></ul><h2>The best Cyber Monday deals on MacBooks and Macs</h2><h3>MacBook Air</h3><p>Apple's thin-and-light MacBook Pro is available at a discount this holiday season. It's not the newest version that runs on Apple's new M1 chip, but it's still powerful enough for students and those looking for a laptop for casual work. Like Apple's other recent laptops, it comes with the company's improved Magic Keyboard, which is much more comfortable and durable than the keyboards on older models released from 2015 onward.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5e725978c485403f18011463\" data-purchase-option=\"Best Buy\">Early 2020 MacBook Air (10th-gen dual-core Core i3, 8GB RAM, 256GB) (medium, Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f81d1a57be3a462cd3cffc7\" data-purchase-option=\"Woot\">2020 MacBook Air (10th-gen quad-core Core i5, 8GB RAM, 512GB) (medium, Preferred: Woot)</bi-shortcode><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-macbook-air-2020-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">See our review of the 2020 Intel-based MacBook Air</a></h3><h3>MacBook Pro</h3><p>Looking for something more powerful? Discounts on Apple's 16-inch and 13-inch MacBook Pros are available today on Cyber Monday. With its larger screen and booming speakers, the 16-inch MacBook Pro is ideal for those looking for a more desktop-like experience in a laptop. The 13-inch model may lack the 16-inch version's impressive speakers, but it still offers more powerful performance than the Air in a more compact design than the 16-inch variant.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f80c124977c4305bc315937\" data-purchase-option=\"Amazon\">MacBook Pro (16-inch, 16GB RAM, 1TB Storage) (medium, Preferred: Amazon)</bi-shortcode><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-macbook-pro-16-inch-review-specs-best-work-laptop-2019-11#overall-the-new-macbook-pro-is-the-best-apple-laptop-you-can-buy-for-getting-work-done-but-its-still-notably-expensive-compared-to-windows-alternatives-5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read our 16-inch MacBook Pro review</a></h3><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f9953cce155cf27d2170c16\" data-purchase-option=\"Amazon\">MacBook Pro (2020, 13-inch, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, 4 ports) (medium, Preferred: Amazon)</bi-shortcode><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-macbook-pro-13-inch-2020-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read our 13-inch MacBook Pro review</a></h3><h3><strong>Apple Mac Mini (M1)</strong></h3><p>Apple just launched the updated Mac Mini with its M1 chip earlier this month, and it's already available at a discount this Cyber Monday. Apple's new processor brings serious performance gains to the Mac Mini compared to its Intel-powered predecessor, making it an ideal choice for those who want a fast new Apple desktop at a decent price. One important factor to remember, however, is that since it runs on Apple's M1 chip, its processor is based on a different architecture than Intel-powered computers. Most apps should run just fine despite this change, but it's still important to keep in mind.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fb7e04a94ffac28ea6a415b\" data-purchase-option=\"Adorama\">Mac Mini (2020) with M1 (medium, Preferred: Adorama)</bi-shortcode><h2>The best Cyber Monday deals on Beats headphones</h2><h3>Beats Studio3</h3><p>If you want the ease-of-use of AirPods but in an over-the-ear format, check out the Beats Studio3. They offer long battery life and noise cancellation at a more affordable price of $174.99, making them an ideal choice if blocking out distractions is a priority for you.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5fb599ea3e29a6495422e4e1\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5fb599ea3e29a6495422e4e1&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h3>Beats Solo Pro</h3><p>At $179.99, the Beats Solo Pro are a compelling choice for those looking for a solid pair of on-ear headphones. They come with Apple's newer H1 chip unlike the Studio3, which means they should be able to connect to Apple devices more quickly than headphones powered by Apple's older chip. They also offer long battery life and useful noise cancelling technology.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5dcc55b53afd3708c454f263\" data-purchase-option=\"Best Buy\">Solo Pro (medium, Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><h3>PowerBeats Pro</h3><p>If you're interested in AirPods but aren't wild about their fit, consider the PowerBeats Pro. These truly wireless earbuds have a lot of the same technology as AirPods — like quick pairing and auto play and pause — but come with a different design that wraps around the ear for a more secure fit. They also offer impressively long battery life and are sweat resistant, making them worth checking out if you're after a pair of workout headphones.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5db72f70dee019224c772d34\" data-purchase-option=\"Best Buy\">Powerbeats Pro (medium, Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><h3>Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones</h3><p>With Apple's W1 chip for fast pairing with your iPhone, Siri support, and 40 hours of battery life, the Beats Solo3 are a solid option for Apple loyalists who prefer an on-ear fit versus earbuds or over-ear headphones. They're an even better deal this Cyber Monday at just $119, a discount of about $80.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc186b2ad4c5d7f5c19d9cb\" data-purchase-option=\"Amazon\">Solo3 Wireless Headphones (medium, Preferred: Amazon)</bi-shortcode><h2>Apple Cyber Monday deals FAQs</h2><h3>Does Apple offer deals on Black Friday and Cyber Monday?</h3><p>Apple rarely discounts its own products on Black Friday. Instead, Apple usually offers gift cards along with certain eligible purchases. This year, the company is <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fgifts%2Fshopping-eventng-event\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">giving away gift cards</a> of up to $150 from November 27 through November 30 on purchases that meet the following criteria:&#160;</p><ul><li>iPhone — Get a $50 gift card when you purchase an iPhone 11, iPhone SE, or iPhone XR </li><li>Apple Watch — Get a $25 gift card when you purchase an Apple Watch Series 3 </li><li>AirPods — Get a $25 gift card when you purchase AirPods Pro, AirPods with wireless charging case, or AirPods with charging case </li><li>iPad — Get up to a $100 gift card when you buy an iPad Mini or iPad Pro </li><li>Mac — Get a $150 gift card when buying eligible MacBook Pro or iMac models </li><li>Apple TV and HomePod — Get up to a $100 gift card when buying an Apple TV 4K, Apple TV HD, or HomePod </li><li>Beats — Get a $50 gift card when buying Beats Studio3, Beats Solo Pro, Beats Solo3, Powerbeats Pro, or Powerbeats headphones</li></ul><h3>Should I buy from Amazon, Target, Best Buy, or Walmart?</h3><p>Many of these retailers offer very similar deals on products like the AirPods and the Apple Watch, which means you'll have a couple of options should one retailer go out of stock. In instances where multiple retailers offer the same product at the same price, consider which retailer is most convenient for you in terms of shipping options. If you have an Amazon Prime membership and want to get the product as fast as possible, it might make more sense to purchase through Amazon. But, if you'd rather pick up the item at your nearby Target or Best Buy, you should consider ordering from your preferred brick-and-mortar retailer. Regardless of which major retailer you buy it from, Apple will support and service the product.</p><h3>Do these stores offer curbside pickup?</h3><p>Yes, Target, Best Buy, and Walmart all offer curbside pickup. But, you should check with your local retailer since the rules may vary by location and items purchased. Walmart, for example, says that not all stores offer curbside pickup <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fcp%2Ffree-store-pickup%2F2281929F2281929\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">for Black Friday deals</a>.</p><h3>How do we choose the best Apple deals?</h3><p>We select products that meet our high standard of coverage based on testing and research. This includes testing Apple's products as well similar devices from its main competitors.</p><p>We also research prices across retailers like Amazon, Walmart, Target, and Best Buy and compare them against Apple's prices to find the deals that are worth paying attention to.</p><h3>How do I return an Apple product?</h3><p>While the major retailers have generous return policies at the moment, there are exceptions on Apple products. Usually, that means a shorter return window or very specific rules in what you can return. For more on return policies, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-return-online-orders\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">check out our guide</a>.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read That means you can buy those holiday gifts now, and then do a little shopping for yourself before December 9 when the Kohl's Cash expires.</p><p>Some items on the site are further reduced with the promo code \"<strong>YOUGET20</strong>\" (applicable at checkout). The deals we include are the same or better (not including promotional discounts from using certain credit cards).</li><li>We consider products' price histories to evaluate how significant the savings are.</li></ul><h2><strong>When is Cyber Monday 2020?</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday 2020</a> falls on November 30. Deals often start promptly at 12:00 a.m. CT. Unlike Black Friday, Cyber Monday sales are typically only available online, while some Black Friday discounts are available in stores.&#160;</p><h2><strong>Can I order online and pick up in a Kohl's store?</strong></h2><p>Yes. Kohl's is now offering <a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kohls.com%2Fcatalog.jsp%3FCN%3DInStoreOnline%3APick%2520Up%2520in%2520Store%26cid%3Dshopping34cid%3Dshopping34\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">curbside pickup</a> because of the coronavirus pandemic. Certain products can be purchased online and delivered at the store's curb two hours later. More products are also available online to be shipped to your home.&#160;&#160;</p><h2><strong>What should I buy from Kohl's during Cyber Monday?</strong></h2><p>Kohl's has a wide range of products, so expect to find deals in every category, including bakeware, jewelry, shoes, gaming, kitchen appliances, beauty, toys, and more.&#160;</p><p>While Kohl's has deals on items like towels, boots, and pajamas, don't forget about its other sections. For last year's Black Friday event, Kohl's had deals on an <a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kohls.com%2Fproduct%2Fprd-3985815%2Fxbox-one-s-1tb-star-wars-jedi-fallen-order-gaming-console-bundle.jspnsole-bundle.jsp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Xbox One S bundle</a>, <a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kohls.com%2Fproduct%2Fprd-3434644%2Froomba-677-wi-fi-connected-robot-vacuum.jsprobot-vacuum.jsp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Roombas</a>, <a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kohls.com%2Fproduct%2Fprd-3108633%2Fbeats-studio3-wireless-headphones.jsp%3Fcolor%3DWhite%26prdPV%3D46%26cid%3Dshopping34cid%3Dshopping34\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Beats headphones</a>, and <a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kohls.com%2Fproduct%2Fprd-3876256%2Finstant-pot-duo-nova-7-in-1-programmable-pressure-cooker.jspssure-cooker.jsp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Instant Pots</a>. Expect similar deals to extend to Cyber Monday this year.</p><h2><strong>Should I enroll in Kohl's Rewards?&#160;</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kohls.com%2Ffeature%2Frewards.jsp%3Ficid%3Dhpmf-krewards%26cid%3Dshopping34%26ci_mcc%3Dci34%26ci_mcc%3Dci\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Kohl's Rewards</a> is a free program that gives members 5% Kohl's Cash every day (not just during promotional events) on all purchases. Members also get additional rewards, like a birthday gift.&#160;</p><p>The Kohl's Cash you receive through the rewards program becomes available on the first day of the following month, and you have 30 days to use it. If you earn a lot of Kohl's Cash on Cyber Monday, it should be available on December 1. Unless you're shopping at Kohl's again before Christmas, however, you'll lose that bonus cash at the end of the year.&#160;</p><h2><strong>What is Kohl's Cash?</strong></h2><p>Even non-Kohl's Rewards members receive $10 of <a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kohls.com%2Ffeature%2Fkohls-cash.jsp2Fkohls-cash.jsp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Kohl's Cash</a> for every $50 they spend during promotional events, including Cyber Monday 2020. Kohl's Cash is a bit like a coupon you can use on future purchases. Kohl's Cash does expire, and the amount of time you have to use it can vary.&#160;</p><p>For Cyber Monday purchases, you'll receive an email with your Kohl's Cash, and you'll be able to use it on any purchases before its expiration date. The limit on Kohl's Cash for a single purchase is $1,500.&#160;</p><h2><strong>Which is better, Black Friday or Cyber Monday?</strong></h2><p>In 2020, there will be less of a contrast between Black Friday and Cyber Monday. Most people will shop online to avoid crowds, and retailers are less likely to offer in-store-only deals.&#160;</p><p>The good news is that Kohl's has a pretty generous <a href=\"https://track.flexlinkspro.com/a.ashx?foid=1067927.A157993&foc=18&fot=9999&fos=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcs.kohls.com%2Fapp%2Fanswers%2Fdetail%2Fa_id%2F893%2Fsession%2F893%2Fsession%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">return policy</a>, so you can always take back your purchase if you find a better deal elsewhere. Usually, Kohl's has a 30-day return window for electronics, but because so many people give these items as gifts, it's extended until January 31, 2021.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/JLyNhuYlhLE\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 01 Dec 2020 01:04:37 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa47bf01df1d50018219306?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"c3fe821a5488e6c9d68f8b7482e029ed","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-39-297_9ce650df2d4a52da.webp","destWidth":1667,"destHeight":1250,"sourceBytes":90524,"destBytes":90524,"author":"insider@insider.com (Jenny McGrath)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fa47493f7d1cb0019e3a199?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn97@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-53-011_f9db700641b71bb6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JLyNhuYlhLE:gEVGddE1z0A:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn5@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-54-267_e6c6b7b706af3845.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JLyNhuYlhLE:gEVGddE1z0A:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn1@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-58-987_1f887aa85e235c21.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JLyNhuYlhLE:gEVGddE1z0A:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn69@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-46-969_767ebbb7f8bfd9a3.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/JLyNhuYlhLE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn58@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-46-644_f420b5b13f7e86a7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719442},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Washington state launches 'WA Notify,' an anonymous, data-secure app through which COVID-19 positive users can anonymously notify exposure others who have been within 6 feet of them","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/wa-notify-aims-to-alert-users-about-covid-19-exposure-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc5a5e1037cbd0018613046?format=jpeg\" alt=\"WA Notify User Guide\" height=\"1059\" width=\"2118\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Washington Department of Health</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>A new app launched by the Washington State Department of Health and developed in conjunction with the University of Washington seeks to notify users if they have been exposed to COVID-19.</li>\n<li>The app is voluntary and data-secure and is seen as a complementary tool for testing and contact tracing, according to Gov. Jay Inslee's office.</li>\n<li>The app launched Monday as COVID-19 cases remained high in Washington state, with state hospitals nearly running out of capacity, Inslee said at a press conference Monday.&#160;</li>\n<li>\"If another WA Notify user you've been near in the last two weeks later tests positive for COVID-19 and adds their verification code to the app, you'll get an anonymous notification that you've had a possible exposure,\" the Washington Department of Health shared on their website.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>In Washington state, an app could anonymously tell you if you've been exposed to COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://medium.com/wagovernor/inslee-announces-statewide-covid-19-exposure-notification-tool-34b5740aa02\">In a press release</a> on Monday, Washington Gov. Jay Inslee announced Washington Exposure Notifications, also known as WA Notify, an app that will notify users of possible COVID-19 exposures.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.seattletimes.com/seattle-news/health/university-of-washington-to-test-smartphone-app-that-tells-you-if-you-were-exposed-to-the-coronavirus/\">app</a>, which was also discussed at a press conference on Monday, uses Apple and Google Bluetooth technology in order to measure how close Android and iPhone users are. The service is voluntary, but if a user of WA Notify tests positive, they can use the app to notify residents who have been within a 6-foot radius of them.&#160;</p><p>\"When you enable WA Notify, your phone exchanges random, anonymous codes with the phones of people you are near who have also enabled WA Notify,\" the Washington Department of Health shared on their website. \"If another WA Notify user you've been near in the last two weeks later tests positive for COVID-19 and adds their verification code to the app, you'll get an anonymous notification that you've had a possible exposure.\"</p><p>The WA Department of Health, along with Inslee, added that no personal information about the user can be traced or tracked via the app. The University of Washington and the Washington Department of Health developed the app together.</p><p>\"Personal information is not recorded, neither is location. You won't be told where the proximity occurred, no one is recording information as to where either user was, nor are they recording the identity of those phones. So for whatever purpose you want to assure your anonymity, they will be fulfilled,\" Inslee <a href=\"https://www.tvw.org/watch/?clientID=9375922947&eventID=20201111111111\">said</a> at a news conference on Monday. Inslee also added that information about how to enroll in WA Notify is being translated into more than 30 languages for Washington residents.</p><p>The app will be available on the App Store for Apple users and on the Google Play Store for Android users. Specific instructions for <a href=\"https://www.doh.wa.gov/Emergencies/COVID19/WANotify\">enabling</a> notifications as \"Government alerts\" were laid out on the Washington Department of Health website.&#160;</p><p>\"WA Notify complements the actions Washington residents are already taking, like wearing masks, physical distancing, and keeping gatherings small,\" said Secretary of Health John Wiesman. In a <a href=\"https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.08.29.20184135v1\">study</a> cited by Washington state officials, researchers focused on three counties in Washington and found that if 15%&#160;of the population participated, digital exposure notification systems could reduce infections and deaths by approximately 8% and 6%, respectively.</p><p>On Twitter, Inslee <a href=\"https://twitter.com/GovInslee/status/1333548200775487489\">posted</a> that 200,000 people had already enrolled in the notification service.&#160;</p><p>In a statement, Stefano Tessaro, associate professor at the UW Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science &#38; Engineering, addressed user privacy issues.</p><p>\"People are understandably concerned these days about being tracked and having their personal information compromised,\" he said, but claimed that \"the technology behind WA Notify has been vetted by security and privacy experts across the world, and it does not collect or store any information that personally identifies its users. I plan to add WA Notify to my phone and I will encourage my friends and family to use it as well.\"</p><p>The Seattle Times <a href=\"https://www.seattletimes.com/seattle-news/health/wa-notify-system-goes-live-with-covid-exposure-notifications-for-iphone-users-in-washington-state/?utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=owned_echobox_tw_m&utm_source=Twitter#Echobox=160676010706760107\">reported</a> that as early as the launch date on Monday, some users received their first notifications. The Washington Department of Health <a href=\"https://www.doh.wa.gov/Emergencies/COVID19/DataDashboard\">registered</a> 2,345 new COVID-19 cases across the state on November 29, with the number expected to rise after potential Thanksgiving gatherings.&#160;</p><p>New data from the CDC and the Washington State Department of Health showed that Washingtonians traveled <a href=\"https://www.krem.com/article/news/health/coronavirus/thanksgiving-travel-down-across-washington-wsdot-dashboard-shows/293-f1f78921-bff0-4af2-aa61-a593b24e3cd4\">significantly less</a> by air, train, and car for Thanksgiving this year, which Inslee acknowledged as a positive step in beating the curve.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/wa-notify-aims-to-alert-users-about-covid-19-exposure-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a Right now you can shop limited-time deals on headphones, home goods, TVs, Fitbits, Robot vacuums, and more.&#160; &#160;</p><h2 id=\"what-early-black-friday-deals-should-you-buy-at-walmart?\">What should you buy at Walmart during Cyber Monday?</h2><p>Walmart's Cyber Monday offers are on par with those from Best Buy, Target, and Amazon. Outside of a few select doorbusters, we expect each retailer to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stores-that-price-match\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\" data-uri=\"69d1a07efce948c8bf57d0c3b16f6cdd\">price-match their competitors</a>&#160;during the sales event.</p><p>Outside of the savings on TVs, kitchen appliances, and robot vacuums, Walmart also has big discounts on Google's smart home products like the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com/?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FGoogle-Nest-Hub-Charcoal%2F473535403&xcust=1606746479038awi98xjkh|xid:fr1606746483507hji746483507hji\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nest Hub</a> and <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com/?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FGoogle-Nest-Mini-2nd-Generation-Chalk%2F751612012&xcust=1606746479038a3feo8eeo|xid:fr1606746483507dab746483507dab\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nest Mini</a>.</p><h2>How we selected the best Cyber Monday deals at Walmart:</h2><ul><li>We only choose products that meet our high standard of coverage, from brands we've tested and trust.</li><li>We compare the prices against other retailers like Amazon, Target, and Best Buy and only include the deals that are the same or better (not including promotional discounts that come from using certain credit cards).</li><li>We research price history thoroughly, to ensure that every deal we list is actually worth your time.</li></ul><h2 id=\"does-walmart-have-curbside-pickup?\">Does Walmart have curbside pickup?</h2><p>To help alleviate that stress that comes with holiday shipping delays, Walmart will offer contact-free curbside pickup for online orders on Cyber Monday. Going this route can save shoppers from any shipping-related headaches and get you your products in sooner. Plus, there's little risk of your packages going missing.</p><h2>Should I get Walmart+?</h2><p>New to 2020 is <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-uri=\"2ba027311c1e8b3933e48ac9b99ad8e6\">Walmart+</a>, the premium retail subscription from Walmart. While the benefits frankly <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-prime-vs-walmart-plus-price-perks-delivery-benefits-2020-7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">don't match what a Prime subscription offers</a>, there's a free trial to take advantage of free shipping and any possible exclusive offers Walmart may surprise us with.</p><p>For the two-week trial, shoppers can choose to start it along with their Cyber Monday purchases to get the best bang for their buck.&#160;&#160;</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5f9ae51ae155cf055157c37b\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/M4xLW0Jz4Eg\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 01 Dec 2020 01:08:54 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa47bf01df1d50018219306?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"eb142debc5feae878ad7c521c01805bf","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-39-297_9ce650df2d4a52da.webp","destWidth":1667,"destHeight":1250,"sourceBytes":90524,"destBytes":90524,"author":"tbufete@businessinsider.com (Tercius Bufete)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fa475c8f7d1cb0019e3a1a5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn70@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-43-945_7e15f4bd082d8987.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=M4xLW0Jz4Eg:QqadTve2le4:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn17@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-57-468_c843191ac03e8931.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=M4xLW0Jz4Eg:QqadTve2le4:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn38@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-50-049_eb63359c781a92df.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=M4xLW0Jz4Eg:QqadTve2le4:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn45@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-46-728_af2fa97e0fd063bb.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/M4xLW0Jz4Eg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn17@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-49-780_be565faf55a960a1.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719443},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"A woman said she gave birth to a baby with protective COVID-19 antibodies after contracting the virus during pregnancy","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/singapore-woman-says-gave-birth-baby-with-covid-19-antibodies-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e4ebad4bb2ebc74a1482603?format=jpeg\" alt=\"pregnant woman pregnancy expectant expecting first second third trimester fertile fertility mom mother parent maternity baby birth labor cox 4\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Crystal Cox/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>A woman in Singapore who had COVID-19 in March just gave birth to a baby who has antibodies that seem to be protective against the virus, she told a local paper.&#160;</li>\n<li>Past research has suggested antibodies against COVID-19 cross the placenta in utero, but little is known about how long the presumed immunity may last and how the timing of infection during pregnancy plays a role.&#160;</li>\n<li>Breast milk also has detectable antibodies against COVID-19 and there's no evidence it transmits the virus, leading health organizations to encourage moms with the illness to breastfeed while taking precautions.&#160;&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>When Celine Ng-Chan was 10 weeks pregnant, she was diagnosed with COVID-19. Back then, in March, even less was known about how the coronavirus affected pregnant women and their future children.</p><p>But now that Ng-Chan, a private tutor in Singapore, gave birth to her son Aldrin in early November, the news is encouraging both for Ng-Chan and other women who have or contract COVID-19 when pregnant.&#160;</p><p>Aldrin is COVID-19-free and appears to have acquired protective antibodies at least temporarily from his mother's illness, Ng-Chan <a href=\"https://www.straitstimes.com/singapore/infected-after-holiday-to-europe-pregnant-mum-gives-birth-to-baby-with-covid-19-antibodies\">told the Straits Times. </a>&#160;Ng-Chan wasn't COVID-19 positive during delivery.&#160;</p><p>\"My pregnancy and birth was smooth sailing despite being diagnosed with COVID-19 in my first trimester, which is the most unstable stage of the pregnancy. I'm very blessed to have Aldrin and he came out very healthy,\" Ng-Chan said. \"I feel relieved my COVID-19 journey is finally over now.\"</p><p>Her story adds a face to research suggesting that mother-to-infant COVID-19 transmission is rare, and that babies born to women who've had the illness may be somewhat protected, Dr. Jessica Madden, a pediatrician and neonatologist who serves as medical director of <a href=\"http://aeroflowbreastpumps.com/\">Aeroflow Breastpumps,&#160; </a>told Insider.&#160;</p><h2>Some COVID-19 antibodies seem to cross the placenta&#160;&#160;</h2><p>Small studies have suggested that COVID-positive mothers pass on IgG antibodies — the type that indicate recovery — against the virus to their fetuses in utero.&#160;</p><p>One <a href=\"https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jama/fullarticle/2763854\">March paper</a> of six women who tested positive for the virus at delivery, for instance, found five had elevated levels of IgG antibodies even though none had COVID-19. All of the women wore masks, delivered their babies via C-section in negative-pressure isolation rooms, and were isolated from their children immediately after delivery — something <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/new-moms-covid-very-low-risk-transmission-to-babies-study-2020-10\">more recent research has suggested is unnecessary</a>.</p><p>An <a href=\"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33073377/\">October case report</a> also describes an infant born to a mom with asymptomatic COVID-19 who had IgG antibodies but a negative COVID test, demonstrating \"passive immunity\" through the placenta, the authors write.&#160;</p><p>In some ways, this is expected, since IgG antibodies against other bacteria and viruses are known to protect fetuses and newborns against infectious diseases, Madden told Insider.&#160;</p><p>\"This is the reason why certain vaccines, like pertussis and flu, are recommended during pregnancy,\" she said. \"IgG antibodies increase in fetuses later in pregnancy, especially after the 36-week gestation mark.\"&#160;</p><p>Still, more research is needed to understand how severity of illness affects antibody levels, how time of infection during pregnancy plays a role, and how strong and long-lasting babies' presumed immunity is.</p><p><a href=\"https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/26/10/20-2328_article\">One study out of Wuhan</a>, China, including 24 COVID-19-positive pregnant women suggested any immunity in newborns wanes quickly.&#160;&#160;</p><p>What's more, Madden said, \"we do not know if having COVID-19 prior to pregnancy will provide IgG immunity to fetuses who are conceived after a mother has already recovered from the virus.\"&#160;</p><h2>Breast milk has detectable antibodies too&#160;</h2><p>The breast milk of moms recently infected with COVID-19 is also believed to offer some protection to newborns. One <a style=\"font-size: 15px;\" href=\"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7523143/\">preprint study</a> in September showed that of 37 milk samples, none had detectable virus but all had antibodies thought to neutralize COVID-19.&#160;</p><p>This too isn't entirely surprising since some breast milk antibodies are known to help protect babies from various diseases like measles while they're too young to receive a vaccine. Breastfeeding is also associated with a lower risk of conditions, including diabetes, asthma, sudden infant death syndrome, and some gastrointestinal illnesses.&#160;</p><p>Those benefits outweigh the still-yet-unseen risks of breastfeeding with COVID-19, according to top health organizations like the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, as long as new moms with the illness take precautions like wearing a mask and washing their hands and breasts before nursing.&#160;</p><p>Read more:</p><ul class=\"read-more-links\"><li><a href=\"https://www.insider.com/lab-grown-human-breast-milk-may-soon-be-option-biomilq-2020-2\" data-read-more-link=\"\" data-e2e-name=\"read-more-link\">Lab-made 'human' breast milk may soon be an option for parents who can't breastfeed but don't want to use formula</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-pregnant-women-should-know-about-the-coronavirus-2020-3\" data-read-more-link=\"\" data-e2e-name=\"read-more-link\">What pregnant women should know about the coronavirus</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.insider.com/breast-milk-may-help-identify-treatments-coronavirus-2020-5\" data-read-more-link=\"\" data-e2e-name=\"read-more-link\">New moms who've recovered from the coronavirus appear to have a 'strong immune response' to the disease in their breast milk</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pregnant-women-with-covid-19-more-likely-icu-cdc-2020-11\" data-read-more-link=\"\" data-e2e-name=\"read-more-link\">CDC: COVID-19 is more likely to be serious or deadly in pregnant women than other women of the same age</a></li></ul><div (Anna Medaris Miller)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5e4ebad4bb2ebc74a1482603?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn89@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-44-275_a3c676e12443854d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zbmgqg8D5aE:q4blLqeBdDI:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn5@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-52-864_9cb0ddebffdf7554.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zbmgqg8D5aE:q4blLqeBdDI:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn86@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-59-652_f32c4be7cbd3f1fd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=zbmgqg8D5aE:q4blLqeBdDI:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn53@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-46-693_e160a1fb3d56517a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/zbmgqg8D5aE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn73@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-46-372_ef73c7f716e5aebd.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719448},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Market capitalization tells you how much a company is worth, and whether buying its stock suits your overall investing strategy","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-market-cap","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc55b8550e71a00115580d1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"market cap\" height=\"1500\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Stocks are often classified by their market caps, and each market-cap category offers different risks and rewards for investors.\n<p class=\"copyright\">picture alliance / Contributor/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Market capitalization (\"market cap\") is the total value of all a company's stock: the number of outstanding shares by the share price.</li>\n<li>Stocks are often categorized by the size of their market capitalization: large-cap, mid-cap, small-cap, or micro-cap.</li>\n<li>An indicator of financial strength, market capitalization suggests how risky a stock is and what kinds of returns it might offer.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\"><strong>Visit Business Insider's Investing Reference library for more stories.</strong></a></li>\n</ul><p>A big part of the investing game is trying to figure out what a company is <em>worth</em>. If you can measure a company's value, you'll be in a better position to know whether you want to commit your hard-earned capital to its stock.&#160;</p><p>Of course, a variety of ways exist to evaluate public companies and their stock. One of the most common is by market capitalization, or \"market cap\" for short.</p><p>A company's market capitalization is what it would cost you if you were to buy up all of its outstanding shares at the current share price. It is a way of sizing up a company by the value that investors put on it.&#160;</p><p>Here's how it works, and why it matters to your investing strategy.</p><h2>What is market capitalization?</h2><p>Market capitalization is essentially the total value of a company's outstanding stock.&#160;</p><p>Expressed in dollar figures (or whatever the local currency), it's made up of two factors: the number of a company's outstanding shares, and the price of each share.&#160;</p><p>A company's market cap is often included in its online stock listing or company profile. But figuring it out isn't all that hard. To calculate the market capitalization you simply multiply the number of shares outstanding by the price per share.&#160;</p><p>For example, a company that has 50 million outstanding shares and a share price of $10 has a market capitalization of $500 million.</p><p>We could use Apple (<a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/aapl-stock\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">AAPL</a>) as a real-life example. As of December 2020, Apple has about 17 billion shares outstanding. The price of Apple's stock is at $113.85 per share. To calculate the market capitalization, we multiply the two and get about $1,921 billion.</p><h3>What makes market capitalization change?&#160;</h3><p>Since it depends directly on a company's stock price, market capitalization changes every day. As the price of a company's stock goes up, so does its market capitalization, and vice versa.&#160;</p><p>Changes in the number of outstanding shares also influences market capitalization. Companies sometimes issue additional shares to raise capital or buy back shares. Assuming a constant share price, issuing shares would increase market capitalization and buying them back would decrease it.&#160;</p><h2>Market capitalization categories and investment strategies</h2><p>You'll often hear companies classified in terms of their market capitalization. Based on dollar size, these classifications can also help investors pick the right stocks for their investment goals and risk tolerance.</p><p>The most common market cap categories for stocks are:</p><ul><li>Large-cap</li><li>Mid-cap</li><li>Small-cap&#160;</li><li>Micro-cap and nano-cap</li></ul><p>Although no official or legal designations exist, there are generally agreed-upon boundaries for each market cap category.</p><h3>Large-cap valuation</h3><p>Large-caps have a market capitalization of over $10 billion. They are are very large companies, usually those with a long history and a household name: Apple, Visa, Johnson &#38; Johnson, Walmart.&#160;</p><p>They are typically less risky investments, given that they're backed by years of stable earnings and stock price performance. However, as mature corporations, they also usually do not grow very quickly.&#160;</p><p>For investors, that means large-cap stocks may bring steady — but not massive — returns. Most <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-are-blue-chip-stocks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">blue-chip stocks</a> are large-caps.&#160;</p><h3>Mid-cap valuation</h3><p>Mid-caps have a market capitalization between $2 and $10 billion. They are usually sizable, well-established companies. Some may be familiar names, like American Eagle Outfitters, Lending Tree, and TripAdvisor; others might be less well-known, but are respected and fast-rising in their field, like Peloton or Diamondback Energy.&#160;</p><p>As their name suggests, mid-caps occupy a middle ground for investors: They may be riskier than large-caps, but are still relatively safe (certainly more so than the small-caps, from whose ranks they often spring). Their stock can be more volatile than large-caps', but it also may also have more potential for appreciation, as many of these companies are still actively growing.&#160;</p><h3>Small-cap valuation</h3><p>Small-cap companies are riskier still. But with a market capitalization between $300 million and $2 billion, they can provide opportunities for major appreciation; in fact, these firms are often the darlings of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/growth-investing-definition-strategies\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">growth-oriented investors</a>. Getting in on the ground floor of a successful small-cap company can be very lucrative — if you guess right. But it may take time for it to pay off, and unlike the large- or mid-caps, it probably won't be providing much in terms of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-a-dividend\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">dividends</a> or other returns in the meanwhile.</p><p>Small-cap companies include Neophotonics Corp., Unisys Corp., and Purple Innovation.&#160;</p><h3>Micro-cap and nano-cap valuation</h3><p>Smaller companies can be divided even further. Micro-caps are typically companies that have a market capitalization between $50 million and $300 million. Nano-caps are those with a market capitalization below $50 million.&#160;</p><p>These are often very risky investments with lots of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-volatility\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">volatility</a>. Most <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-are-penny-stocks\">penny stocks</a> fall into the nano- or micro- categories.&#160;</p><h2>Why is market capitalization important?&#160;</h2><p>Market cap is an important concept because it allows investors to understand the size of a company and how much its worth on the market.&#160;Since companies of different market-cap sizes vary in terms of their growth potential, income payments, and risk, spreading your investments among them is one way to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-diversify-portfolio\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">balance your portfolio</a> between appreciation and income, between conservative and aggressive.</p><p>Often, investors focus on a particular market cap segment. Some may choose to stick with the big, stable, large-caps — especially if they want to preserve their capital or derive income from their investments. Others may be attracted to the more volatile — and exciting — small-caps, especially if they have a long time horizon to weather volatility or like aggressive growth stocks.</p><p>Cutting across industries and industrial sectors, each market cap group encompasses a big variety of companies and stocks. Still, analysts do note common tendencies and characteristics among stocks of similar market caps.</p><p>For example, <a href=\"https://www.creighton.edu/faculty-directory-profile/2010/robert-johnson\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Robert R. Johnson</a>, Professor of Finance at Creighton University, notes that small-caps may be more volatile than mid- and large-caps — but they tend to perform better.&#160;</p><p>\"From 1926 to 2019, large-cap stocks have provided average returns of 10.2% annually; small-cap stocks over the same time period provided annual returns of 11.9%,\" he says.&#160;</p><p>It doesn't sound like much in percentage terms. However, \"over many years, that difference is enormous: one dollar invested in large-caps at the end of 1925, with dividends reinvested, would have grown to $9,243.90. That same dollar invested in small-caps would have grown to $39,380.90.,\" Johnson notes.</p><p>\"The bottom line is that small-cap stocks provide higher returns, on average — but that comes at the cost of greater risk.\"</p><h2>Market capitalization vs. market value</h2><p>You'll sometimes hear \"market capitalization\" used interchangeably with \"market value.\" But they don't mean the same thing. Whereas market capitalization is a single, easy-to-calculate figure, market value is a more complex, amorphous characteristic that we try to estimate in a number of ways.&#160;</p><p>As <a href=\"https://firstratedata.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Ryan Maxwell</a>, COO at FirstRate Data, notes, \"market value\" is a generic term that refers to the value of an investment (such as a company's stock) as determined by a market (usually, the stock market). Reflecting investor sentiment, it might take into account company assets, fundamentals, and other factors.&#160;</p><p>For example, Maxwell says, a company's enterprise value is another specific measure of a company's market value, one that considers its debt as well as its stock.&#160;</p><p>Alongside market capitalization and enterprise valuation, investors will often use ratios such as price-to-earnings ratio, price-to-sales ratios, and return on equity to compare values between companies.&#160;</p><p>\"Everyone is working to measure a company's true market value,\" <a href=\"https://www.magnifina.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Asher Rogovy</a>, Chief Investment Officer at Magnifina, says. \"Whoever understands the true value can profit by trading mispriced stocks. Market capitalization represents how investors, on average, estimate true market value. It's one indicator of market value and a great starting point for analysis.\"</p><h2>The financial takeaway</h2><p>Market capitalization is a way to measure what a company's worth is. Essentially the collective price of all of a company's outstanding shares, market capitalization tells us about the value that investors put on a company's stock.&#160;</p><p>And<em> that </em>tells us, indirectly, about what we can expect from the company in terms of returns.&#160;</p><p>Companies with lower market capitalization values may be riskier but can pay off big. Companies with greater market capitalizations probably will preserve your funds, but may not offer massive gains.&#160;</p><p>If you're a more conservative investor, you may lean towards large-caps. And if you're looking for more of a gamble, small-caps might be for you. If you want a balance in your portfolio — appreciation plus income — the mid-caps may be the way to go.</p><h2>Related Coverage in&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Investing</a>:</h2><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-common-stock\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">What is common stock? The most typical way to invest in a company and profit from its growth</a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-diversify-portfolio\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-position=\"9\" data-analytics-module=\"\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to diversify your portfolio to limit losses and guard against risk</a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-invest-in-penny-stocks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-position=\"10\" data-analytics-module=\"\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to invest in penny stocks: a guide for beginners</a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-common-stock\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-position=\"4\" data-analytics-module=\"\">What is common stock?
