Cyber Monday 4x3\" height=\"1200\" width=\"2400\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Hollis Johnson/Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>The Apple Watch is our favorite smartwatch, and there are plenty of models to accommodate different needs and budgets. If you were already interested in buying Apple's smartwatch, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday</a> is one of the best days to get one since discounts are available on all versions. Many of the deals have already sold out, but there are still some discounts on various models.</p><p>Prices are ranging from $150 on the cheapest Series 3 deal to $480 for the larger-sized Series 6 with GPS and LTE. Right now opting for the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08J5RBMRN/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&slotNum=4&imprToken=6ebb0813-4266-6478-b1e&ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B08J5RBMRN&linkCode=as2&tag=biip_110520_black-friday-deals-20&linkId=55f4c82271ae63b45d85b9fffe74a02d&tag=biip_112620_black-friday-20a02d&#38;tag=biip_112620_black-friday-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Series 6</a> will yield the biggest savings. It's down to $350 from $400, so you'll save $50. We saw a better deal that took $70 off the normal price on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Black Friday</a>, but $350 is still a solid deal on a brand-new Apple Watch Series 6.</p><p>It's important to note that some color options and sizes have varying deals. We try to point out the best deals, but a color or size option you want may not be as discounted, and the colors that hang around the longest may not be your favorite, so act fast.</p><p>You'll also find that certain retailers may not have the Apple Watch model you want for delivery, and stock will vary by location for pickup.</p><p>If you're looking for more savings, be sure to check out all the best <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-tech-deals-sales\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday tech deals here</a>. You can also <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-deals-right-now-2020-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">read our Cyber Monday liveblog for additional deal highlights</a>.&#160;</p><h2>The best Cyber Monday Apple Watch deals</h2><h3>Apple Watch Series 6&#160;</h3><p>The Series 6 is Apple's top-of-the-line smartwatch, and this iteration has brought improvements like a new blood oxygen sensor, faster charging, and a brighter always-on display. If you want the Apple Watch with all the bells and whistles, the Series 6 is the one for you. It is available at a $50 discount at both Amazon and Target. If you're willing to make some compromises when it comes to features, keep scrolling to the SE or the older Series 3.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f6cfb0302495a07337f0624\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">Watch Series 6 (40mm, GPS) (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc3a69fc7bd8517f357b556\" data-purchase-option=\"Amazon\">Watch Series 6 (40mm, GPS + Cellular) (medium, Preferred: Amazon)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc3a4eb19a2461eb656fd05\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">Watch Series 6 (44mm, GPS) (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc4f735664756351827b1d2\" data-purchase-option=\"Amazon\">Watch Series 6 (44mm, GPS + Cellular) (medium, Preferred: Amazon)</bi-shortcode><h3>Apple Watch SE&#160;</h3><p>The Apple Watch SE is already a great deal, and it's even cheaper during Cyber Week. This is Apple's mid-tier watch, and it still has most of the features you'll find in the Series 6 such as a larger screen than the series 3, activity tracking features, and Apple's newest processor. You'll sacrifice the always-on display, blood oxygen readings, and the ability to take an ECG.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f848449bf96b920706aaf85\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">Watch SE (40mm, GPS) (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><p>We had trouble finding this model in stock in several stores we checked. It's available, though on backorder, <a href=\"https://api.narrativ.com/api/v0/client_redirect/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fapple-watch-nike-se-gps-40mm-space-gray-aluminum-case-with-anthracite-black-nike-sport-band-space-gray%2F6215904.p%3FskuId%3D6215904%26nrtv_cid%3D.nrtv_plchldr.%26subId2%3Dbusinessinsider%26subId3%3D1725286954599216963%26subId1%3D&a=1725273846181521426&uuid=0a81cc37-855b-4db8-bb63-1c41e7807665&uid_bam=1720901430753973092&ar=17252869545992169635286954599216963\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">from Best Buy</a> for $30 more.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc3ac96f45c23134f08f526\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">Watch SE (40mm, GPS + Cellular) (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><p>If it's not available at a Target near you, you can <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08J64N5ML?tag=biip_112620_black-friday-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">try Amazon</a>, which is selling the SE for $30 more.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc3aa746bba791a4c3b2fe4\" data-purchase-option=\"Amazon\">Watch SE (44mm, GPS) (medium, Preferred: Amazon)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fb6920035c2d9606510f1d4\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">Watch SE (44mm, GPS + Cellular) (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><p>If you can't find the watch at Target, you may be able to <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08J5S19RF?tag=biip_112620_black-friday-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">get it on Amazon</a> for $30 more.</p><h3>Apple Watch Series 3&#160;</h3><p>The Apple Watch Series 3 was first released three years ago, but it's still a perfectly capable smartwatch for those in search of a bargain. It runs the latest Apple Watch software, so you'll see many of the same basic features offered by the SE and Series 6. This is a great buy if you're looking for a way to check your notifications and track your workouts and activity.&#160;</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5d35e177100a24190c405c8a\" data-purchase-option=\"Target\">Watch Series 3 (38mm, GPS) (medium, Preferred: Target)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fb6ef2ad2a0a4191f26c616\" data-purchase-option=\"Best Buy\">Watch Series 3 (38mm, GPS + Cellular) (medium, Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5f80a507ce3d6909265d447b\" data-purchase-option=\"Amazon\">Watch Series 3 (42mm, GPS) (medium, Preferred: Amazon)</bi-shortcode><h3>Apple Watch Series 5</h3><p>The Apple Watch Series 5 is still a fantastic smartwatch that's a bit more capable than the Series SE but at a cheaper price than the Series 6. It has an always-on display and the ability to take an ECG from the wrist — two features that are missing from the SE. It lacks other new health features like blood oxygen measurements, but still offers many of Apple's other health-oriented features.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5fc1cc87f41f587aff2f41f8\" data-purchase-option=\"Best Buy\">Watch Series 5 (GPS + Cellular, 40mm) (medium, Preferred: Best Buy)</bi-shortcode><h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">See more Cyber Monday 2020 sales and deals</a></h2><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article 2020 21:55:55 sale of the year, and as many of us head into winter and face an unprecedented amount of time at home (and probably in bed), there's no better time to ditch that ratty old mattress and give your bedroom the upgrade it deserves.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Black Friday</a> held some outstanding deals, but luckily for the stragglers, they've mostly stuck around through <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday</a> and even through the rest of the week.</p><p>Below are the best mattress deals we've found on Cyber Monday. They both have sales of at least 10% so there's never a reason to pay full-price, but these discounts are the steepest we've seen. We don't expect either brand to have a better sale as we head into the holiday season.&#160;</p><p>If you're not sure which mattress is right for you, check out <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-mattress\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">our guide to the best mattresses</a>. 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"The mysterious Utah monolith disappeared, and brands like Southwest, MoonPie, and Steak-umm are making it all about themselves on Twitter","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/brands-joke-about-utah-monolith-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fbd59c532f2170011f70fa3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"monolith, UFO, Utah\" height=\"799\" width=\"1066\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A monolith was spotted in Utah by state employees counting sheep by helicopter.\n<p class=\"copyright\">The Utah highway patrol</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The metal monolith recently discovered in Utah disappeared.</li>\n<li>Brands like Southwest Airlines and Steak-umm used the trending story to talk about themselves.&#160;</li>\n<li>It's the latest example of a trend for brands to try to join memes and get attention online, especially on Twitter.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The metal monolith discovered in a Utah desert has mysteriously disappeared, <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/strange-metal-monolith-found-in-utah-desert-has-mysteriously-vanished-2020-11\">Insider reported Sunday.</a> As corners of the Internet discuss theories and jokes about where the sculpture came from and where it went, brands quickly joined in.</p><p>Workers from The Utah Division of Wildlife Resources first spotted the 12-foot tall structure in public land south of Moab on November 18, according to a <a href=\"https://dpsnews.utah.gov/dps-aero-bureau-encounters-monolith-in-red-rock-country/\">statement</a> from the Utah Department of Public Safety. Google Earth images show that the monolith appeared in the desert sometime between <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/utah-helicopter-patrol-found-mysterious-metal-obelisk-in-the-desert-2020-11\">August 2015 and October 2016.</a></p><p><em><strong>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cheetos-mac-n-cheese-key-to-quakers-sales-in-2021-2020-11?r=mm-sub\">Quaker Oats' top exec explains how Cheetos Mac 'n Cheese and new breakfast options helped generate the brand's best sales year in a decade</a></strong></em></p><p>On Sunday, the monolith disappeared with no explanation. The Department of Safety had <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/utah-helicopter-patrol-found-mysterious-metal-obelisk-in-the-desert-2020-11\">joked</a> that it was left behind by aliens, so some have stuck with that theory. Of course, as soon as these jokes started to gain traction, brands active on Twitter had to jump in. Mostly food brands responded that they, too, wanted to be abducted like the monolith, and some edited products into the image.&#160;</p><p>Maybe the most creative, Southwest Airlines shared an image made by a follower that turned the the monolith into part of an airline gate.</p><p>See what the brands had to say here.</p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tSouthwest Airlines\n\t\n\t<blockquote While there aren't any special Cyber Monday deals, it could still be a good pick for young children or as a secondary Switch used for traveling.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5fc58b7fbca41b5b930448b6\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5fc58b7fbca41b5b930448b6&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5da0bf874af909707f7a61aa\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5da0bf874af909707f7a61aa&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5ee105222618b968d35d7e86\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5ee105222618b968d35d7e86&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2 id=\"black-friday-deals-on-nintendo-switch-video-games\"><strong>Cyber Monday deals on Nintendo Switch video games</strong></h2><p>Nintendo's exclusive franchises, like \"Super Mario,\" \"Pokémon,\" and \"The Legend of Zelda,\" are the Switch's main attraction, and you'll find games from those series on sale at most major retailers today. The Cyber Monday discounts today are consistent with the lowest prices we've seen for these $60 games to date.</p><p>Prices vary from game to game and store to store, but we've found that GameStop has the most consistent deals, with $20 off most of Nintendo's first party titles like \"New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe.\" If you're looking for a specific game, be sure to check multiple stores.</p><p>For example, Best Buy's $20 off is the best deal for \"<a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1725261973610412863\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Pokémon Sword and Shield</a>,\" the newest games in the series, while Target has an $80 bundle that features \"Super Mario Party\" and \"Mario Kart 8 Deluxe\" — normally a $100 or $120 package.</p><p>Nintendo is also offering up to 50% off dozens of digital games in the Switch's online eShop. If you can find a deal in stores, there's a chance the digital version is already on sale. Likewise, Target, Best Buy, GameStop and Amazon are offering the same price $40 on digital copies of games like \"<a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1725261738581313734\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Super Mario Party</a>.\"</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5efb9ffb3ad8613a5a19f2f4\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5efb9ffb3ad8613a5a19f2f4&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2 id=\"other-great-nintendo-switch-black-friday-deals-and-gift-ideas\">Other great Nintendo Switch Cyber Monday deals and gift ideas</h2><p>If you can't find the right game for the Switch player in your life, you can still <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newegg.com%2Fnintendo-50-00%2Fp%2FN82E1683207400432074004\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">buy them a discounted digital gift card</a> so they can add money to their Nintendo Switch eShop account. You can also buy a Nintendo Switch Online subscription, which is required to play most games online and offers dozens of classic games from the Nintendo and Super Nintendo consoles. Amazon is offering a package deal for <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/dp/B089YT8XRZ?tag=biip_112620_cyber-monday-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">one year of Nintendo Switch online with a 128GB MicroSD card</a> for $40, a $15 savings.</p><p>MicroSD cards are on sale throughout today's Cyber Monday event, too, so it's a great time to upgrade your storage from the Switch's internal 32GB.&#160;Make sure you get an SDXC grade card, since the MicroSD's transfer speeds will impact loading times on the Switch.</p><p>While the Switch comes with two Joy-Con controllers, picking up an extra for shared play sessions is never a bad idea. Both&#160;<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01NAWKYZ0?tag=biip_112620_cyber-monday-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\" data-uri=\"475ab39b84cdd96dd84478c734bf6ef3\">Switch Pro controllers</a> and GameCube-style controllers used for \"Super Smash Bros. Ultimate\" are seeing slight discounts for Cyber Monday.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5dd820dbfd9db21a0c415522\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe We choose brands that we've tested and trust.</p><p>We compare prices against Amazon, Target, Walmart, and other retailers. The deals we include are the same or better (not including promotional discounts from using certain credit cards).</p><p>We look at the price history of every product to evaluate how significant the savings are.&#160;</p><h2 id=\"when-is-cyber-monday-2020?\"><strong>When is Cyber Monday 2020?</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\" data-uri=\"bece1f3c41d80f9c8e969139f5d8468f\">Cyber Monday 2020</a>&#160;is on November 30, and unlike some other retailers, Macy's is reserving most deals for Monday.&#160;</p><h2 id=\"can-i-order-online-and-pick-up-in-a--store?\"><strong>Can I order online and pick up in a&#160; store?</strong></h2><p>Yes, for many items but not all. Macy's will offer curbside and in-store pickup. The retailer also ships certain purchases either the same day or the next day.&#160;&#160;</p><h2 id=\"what-should-i-buy-from-macy's-during-cyber-monday?\"><strong>What should I buy from Macy's during Cyber Monday?</strong></h2><p>Macy's has a wide range of products. Expect deals in every category, including bakeware, jewelry, shoes, kitchen appliances, beauty, toys, and more. While it does have some electronics, you're probably better off looking for those deals elsewhere, like Target, Amazon, or Best Buy.&#160;</p><p>For last year's&#160;<a Previously, only people with a Macy's credit card were eligible. It's free to sign up as a \"bronze\" member. At that level, you earn 1% back in rewards, or $10 for every $1,000 you spend. Extra perks include a birthday gift and access to bonus offers.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Silver, gold, and platinum tiers require a Macy's credit card.&#160;</p><h2 id=\"which-is-better,-black-friday-or-cyber-monday?\"><strong>Which is better, Black Friday or Cyber Monday?</strong></h2><p>There is less of a contrast between&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" data-site=\"bi\" data-keyword=\"Black Friday\" data-analytics-product-module=\"Auto-Linker\" data-analytics-product-area=\"link\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"6f373ef450cf753e61e0b3aa31ed093d\">Black Friday</a>&#160;and Cyber Monday this year. More people will shop online than in stores, and most retailers aren't offering in-store-only deals.&#160;</p><p>Macy's has a generous 90-day&#160;<a href=\"https://www.customerservice-macys.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/140/~/what-is-macys-return-policy%3F\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"f5707ac58b1f6d6df314094b79765192\">return policy</a>, which is extended during the holiday season (with exceptions for certain products). If you pick up something and see a better price elsewhere, you should be able to return it.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/macys-cyber-monday-deals'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/ggi40woJ31s\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 01 Dec 2020 02:43:22 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa47bf01df1d50018219306?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"7934e48804da12f38b3f78926c0dd51f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-39-297_9ce650df2d4a52da.webp","destWidth":1667,"destHeight":1250,"sourceBytes":90524,"destBytes":90524,"author":"oburke@businessinsider.com (Owen Burke)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fc5951e50e71a0011558196?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn25@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-45-078_f7f51e874a6036ae.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn90@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-52-597_83faad7047566c1e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn46@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-56-268_176f883218bf234a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ggi40woJ31s:HM3Sj31jshw:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn46@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-50-228_b3f49d6f3e7c539c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/ggi40woJ31s":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn58@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-58-080_fb1266a5ae24dce2.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719344},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Controversial Trump adviser Dr. Scott Atlas resigned from the White House COVID-19 task force","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/scott-atlas-reportedly-resigned-from-white-coronavirus-task-force-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc58a5150e71a001155817f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Scott Atlas\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Scott Atlas listens to US President Donald Trump during a briefing at the White House August 10, 2020, in Washington, DC.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.gettyimages.com/detail/news-photo/member-of-the-coronavirus-task-force-scott-atlas-listens-to-news-photo/1227995063?adppopup=true\" target=\"_blank\">BRENDAN SMIALOWSKI/AFP via Getty</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Dr. Scott Atlas, who served as a special adviser to President Donald Trump on the coronavirus, resigned from the White House COVID-19 task force Monday.</li>\n<li>Atlas, who joined the task force in August, was a <a href=\"https://www2.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Resources/Special+Government+Employees#:~:text=As%20defined%20in%2018%20U.S.C.,period%20of%20365%20consecutive%20days.\">Special Government Employee (SGE)</a>, meaning his role in the task force was temporary and would not exceed 130 days.</li>\n<li>Atlas' push to reopen the US has sparked backlash from critics, including top US infectious disease expert Dr. Anthony Fauci and CDC director Robert Redfield.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Dr. Scott Atlas, who served as a special adviser to President Donald Trump on the coronavirus, resigned from the White House COVID-19 task force on Monday.</p><p>Atlas, who joined the task force in August, was a <a href=\"https://www2.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Resources/Special+Government+Employees#:~:text=As%20defined%20in%2018%20U.S.C.,period%20of%20365%20consecutive%20days.\">Special Government Employee (SGE)</a>, meaning his role in the task force was temporary and would not exceed 130 days. His tenure was set to expire this week, according to the Fox News report. The White House did not immediately respond to a request for comment.</p><p>The White House confirmed Atlas' resignation but declined to comment.</p><p>\"I am writing to resign from my position as Special Advisor to the President of the United States,\" Atlas wrote in a resignation letter obtained by <a href=\"https://www.foxnews.com/politics/dr-scott-atlas-resigns-special-adviser-trump-coronavirus\">Fox News</a>.</p><p>\"As time went on, like all scientists and health policy scholars, I learned new information and synthesized the latest data from around the world, all in an effort to provide you with the best information to serve the greater public good,\" he continued.</p><p>\"But, perhaps more than anything, my advice was always focused on minimizing all the harms from both the pandemic and the structural policies themselves, especially to the working class and the poor,\" he wrote, according to Fox News.</p><p>In the letter, Atlas touted the work of the COVID-19 task force alongside his \"several selfless colleagues in designing specific policies to heighten protection of the vulnerable while safely reopening schools and society.\"</p><p>\"We also successfully designed rational guidelines for safely opening schools, a strategic use of the newly developed testing program, and a national stockpile of drugs for future crises,\" Atlas wrote.</p><p>Earlier this month, Atlas <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/scott-atlas-appeared-on-russian-propaganda-outlet-and-slammed-lockdowns-2020-11\">slammed stay-at-home orders</a> during an appearance on a Russian propaganda outlet, saying \"lockdowns will go down as an epic failure of public policy\" and that they \"are killing people.\" A tweet from <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tweet-removed-dr-scott-atlas-masks-dont-prevent-covid-19-2020-10\">Atlas casting doubt on the efficacy of masks</a> was removed from the social media platform last month.</p><p>\"Twitter seems to be censoring the science if it goes against their own goals of public indoctrination,\" Atlas said in response at the time.</p><p>Atlas' controversial advice — including his push against states' lockdowns and mask mandates — sparked backlash from critics.</p><p>Atlas sparred with top US infectious disease expert Dr. Anthony Fauci over the production of a COVID-19 vaccine, calling <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-advisor-scott-atlas-anthony-fauci-criticism-political-animal-2020-11\">Fauci a \"political animal\" for his \"upbeat\" tone</a> on the pandemic following Election Day.</p><p>\"There's all kinds of prognostications that were made, all negative, all to undermine what the reality of the timelines were, all to undermine the president,\" Atlas said during an interview with Fox News host Laura Ingraham. \"Once you do that sort of thing and make yourself a political animal basically, you lose your credibility.\"</p><p>\"Well maybe he's cheered up because of the election,\" he added.</p><p>Robert Redfield, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, was <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cdc-director-discusses-trump-new-covid-19-task-force-adviser-2020-9\">reportedly overheard</a> saying \"everything\" Atlas said \"is false.\"</p><p>\"I think a lot of the criticism stems from people who are either politically motivated or are interested in maintaining their own stature in the public eye,\" Atlas told <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/scott-atlas-hits-back-critics-questioning-science-fauci-redfield-2020-10\">Business Insider's Ashley Collman</a> in October.</p><p>In his resignation letter, which is dated December 1, Atlas congratulated the work of the team behind Operation Warp Speed, saying the team \"delivered on our promised timelines for new drugs and vaccines.\"</p><p>\"I congratulate you for your vision, and also congratulate the many who did the exemplary work—we know who they are, even though their names are not those familiar to the public,\" Atlas wrote.</p><p>He also gave his best wishes to the incoming Biden-Harris administration \"as they guide the nation through these trying, polarized times.\"</p><p>\"With the emerging treatments and vaccines, I remain highly optimistic that America will thrive once again and overcome the adversity of the pandemic and all that it has entailed,\" Atlas wrote.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/Ya-oB3Gi8vk\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 01 Dec 2020 00:51:29 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f9ed5ee69331a0011bc6989?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"522b0c884cff7aa4885f09ed21fe8be2","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn44@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-39-630_684b09582d6d9a62.webp","destWidth":1777,"destHeight":1333,"sourceBytes":61690,"destBytes":61690,"author":"insider@insider.com (Lauren Frias)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fc58a5150e71a001155817f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn5@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-41-110_d079014ee8b8e172.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn9@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-40-386_30340ec693b503ba.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn77@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-44-082_8832eda319a9fe99.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Ya-oB3Gi8vk:W26a71WI1tU:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn77@2020_5/2020/12/01/06-05-40-676_95a61d2b515d5d61.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/Ya-oB3Gi8vk":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn10@2020_4/2020/12/01/06-05-41-226_8e971c7b53c9f3d5.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719349},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"An Iranian nuclear scientist was assassinated to make it harder for Biden to return to the 2015 nuclear deal, according to top experts","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/iranian-scientist-assassinated-to-make-bidens-job-harder-experts-say-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc5656450e71a0011558118?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Biden transition\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>President-elect Joe Biden.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Joe Raedle/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The assassination of a top Iranian nuclear scientist was designed to derail President-elect Joe Biden's plans to return to the 2015 nuclear deal, according to experts and former US diplomats.</li>\n<li>One top expert on the Middle East told Insider the assassination \"fits with Israeli long-standing policy of targeting Iranian nuclear scientists.\"</li>\n<li>A former US diplomat told Insider there \"are ample reasons to suspect US involvement\" in Friday's attack, citing President Donald Trump's opposition to the Iran nuclear deal.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The assassination of an Iranian nuclear scientist was likely carried out by Israel with the blessing of the Trump administration as part of an effort to derail a major foreign-policy goal of President-elect Joe Biden, according to former US diplomats and top experts.</p><p>Biden has pledged to return the US to the 2015 Iran nuclear deal — formally known as the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA) — an Obama-era pact that both President Donald Trump and Israel oppose.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/scientist-believed-to-be-behind-irans-nuclear-program-assassinated-2020-11\">assassination of Mohsen Fakhrizadeh</a>, often referred to as the father of Iran's nuclear program, may have thrown a major wrench in Biden's plans.</p><p>Mark Fitzpatrick, an associate fellow with the International Institute for Strategic Studies and former US diplomat, told Insider there \"are ample reasons to suspect US involvement\" in Friday's attack.</p><p>\"The assassination is consistent with Trump's efforts to prevent his successor from restoring the JCPOA,\" he said,&#160; citing recent reports on the president's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-considered-attacking-iran-main-nuclear-site-2020-11\">request for military options against Iran</a> and a <a href=\"https://www.axios.com/israels-netanyahu-saudi-for-pompeo-crown-prince-talks-329f800e-dd10-45e0-b0e6-d49aced366f7.html\">secret meeting</a> between the leaders of Israel and Saudi Arabia that Secretary of State Mike Pompeo attended.</p><h2>'It was a provocation'</h2><p>Trump in May 2018 controversially <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/iran-nuclear-deal-explained\">withdrew the US from the JCPOA</a>, an agreement designed to prevent Iran from developing a nuclear weapon in exchange for the easing of economic sanctions. The move was criticized by top US allies — the UK, France, and Germany — that were also among the countries that negotiated the deal with Iran.</p><p>Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, a top critic of the JCPOA, praised Trump for his decision to break from the deal. Iranian leaders have made threats against Israel for years. Like other critics of the pact, Netanyahu felt the deal didn't go far enough to constrain Iran's ability to develop nuclear weapons, and he also viewed the agreement as insufficient in terms of addressing activities from Tehran, Iran, across the region.</p><p>Fakhrizadeh was said to have been behind Iran's Amad, or \"Hope,\" program, which was alleged by the US and other countries to be a covert military operation to conduct research on a nuclear weapon. According to the UN's nuclear watchdog and <a href=\"https://www.dni.gov/files/documents/Newsroom/Reports%20and%20Pubs/20071203_release.pdf\">US intelligence</a>, the program <a href=\"https://www.iaea.org/sites/default/files/gov-2015-68.pdf\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"259c55b669bb090795f962019401c2dc\">ended in 2003</a>.</p><p>\"As important as Fakhrizadeh was to Iran's clandestine nuclear-weapons development program, killing him will not significantly impede Iran's potential to produce nuclear weapons, given how much work they have done to date,\" Fitzpatrick said. \"The reason for assassinating him at this time was less about impeding Iran's war potential and more about impeding diplomacy. It was a provocation.\"</p><p>Barbara Slavin, who directs the Future of Iran Initiative at the Atlantic Council, echoed this view in <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/28/opinion/iran-nuclear-scientist-killed.html\">an op-ed for The New York Times</a>.</p><p>\"Israel and the Trump administration apparently fear that a Biden administration would seek a quick return to the nuclear agreement, which could revive Iran's struggling economy and make it harder to contain its influence in the Middle East,\" Slavin wrote. \"Killing Mr. Fakhrizadeh makes that all the more difficult.\"</p><p>Similarly, Ben Rhodes, a former deputy national security advisor under the Obama administration, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/brhodes/status/1332428818716344320?s=20\">said</a> the assassination was an \"outrageous action aimed at undermining diplomacy between an incoming US administration and Iran.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc4be24037cbd0018612ccf?format=jpeg\" alt=\"TEHRAN, IRAN - NOVEMBER 30: (----EDITORIAL USE ONLY MANDATORY CREDIT - &#34;IRANIAN DEFENSE MINISTRY / HANDOUT&#34; - NO MARKETING NO ADVERTISING CAMPAIGNS - DISTRIBUTED AS A SERVICE TO CLIENTS----) A funeral ceremony of Iranian Top nuclear scientist, Mohsen Fakhrizadeh Mahabadi, held at Defense Ministry of Iran in Tehran, Iran on November 30, 2020. Fakhrizadeh, who headed research and innovation at the defense ministry, was attacked Friday in Damavand county near Tehran. (Photo by Iranian Defense Ministry/Handout/Anadolu Agency via Getty Images)\" height=\"1766\" width=\"2649\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A funeral for Mohsen Fakhrizadeh in Tehran, Iran, on November 30.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Iranian Defense Ministry/Handout/Anadolu Agency via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h2>Iranian leaders are calling for revenge</h2><p>Before Fakhrizadeh's killing, Iran's top diplomat signaled that Tehran would be <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/iran-usa-zarif/irans-zarif-says-biden-can-lift-sanctions-with-three-executive-orders-idUKL8N2I36FV\">open to discussions</a> with Biden on returning to the 2015 deal. But Iranian leaders are now <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/as-iran-buries-its-slain-nuclear-scientist-leaders-vow-revenge-and-no-negotiations-with-the-west/2020/11/30/ebfe3618-32fc-11eb-9699-00d311f13d2d_story.html\">pushing against such negotiations</a> and vowing to avenge Fakhrizadeh's killing, while blaming Israel for his death.</p><p>Israel has not officially addressed Fakhrizadeh's assassination, and the Israeli Embassy in Washington did not comment when contacted by Insider on Friday. But Randa Slim, the director of the Conflict Resolution and Track II Dialogues Program at the Middle East Institute, told Insider that the assassination \"fits with Israeli long-standing policy of targeting Iranian nuclear scientists.\"</p><p>A senior US official <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/irans-president-blames-israel-for-killing-nuclear-scientist-and-vows-to-respond-at-the-right-time/2020/11/28/0e0f9576-30f0-11eb-9dd6-2d0179981719_story.html\">told The Washington Post</a> that the US was not involved in Fakhrizadeh's assassination but added there was \"absolutely no information indicating that it was anyone other than the Israelis.\" The White House did not offer a comment when contacted by Insider on Friday.</p><p>Iran has <a href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/nov/27/iran-has-long-accused-israel-of-killing-its-nuclear-scientists\">blamed Israel for a number of assassinations</a> of scientists in recent years, and the Israelis were suspected of coordinating an <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/an-important-iranian-nuclear-facility-was-apparently-sabotaged-2020-7\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"3895864905a8544b3ae63e358bb7166a\">act of sabotage on Iran's main nuclear facility</a>&#160;in July.</p><h2>Trump withdrew from the Iran nuclear deal in 2018, and tensions have been high ever since</h2><p>Though the US and Iran have been adversaries for decades, tensions reached historic heights in the Trump era. The dynamic between Washington and Tehran became increasingly hostile after Trump withdrew from the JCPOA and reimposed economic sanctions on Iran as part of a \"maximum pressure\" campaign.</p><p>The Trump administration aimed to cripple Iran's economy and squeeze it into negotiating a more stringent version of the 2015 nuclear deal. But in many ways the \"maximum pressure\" campaign only increased Iran's provocative behavior, leading to a series of skirmishes in the Persian Gulf region in 2019.</p><p>Trump in January ordered a drone strike that <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-soleimani-strike-stunning-use-of-leader-decapitation-strategy-2020-1\">killed Iran's top general</a>, Qassem Soleimani, which raised fears of a new war in the Middle East. Iran retaliated with a missile attack that left dozens of US service members seriously injured, but the two sides ultimately backed away from a broader conflict. But the Soleimani strike essentially led Iran to abandon the 2015 nuclear deal altogether.</p><p>Given this history, some in Congress have expressed concerns about the motivations for the attack as well as the consequences.</p><p>\"If the primary purpose of the killing of Mr. Fakhrizadeh was to make it harder to restart the Iran nuclear agreement, then this assassination does not make America, Israel or the world safer,\" Democratic Sen. Chris Murphy of Connecticut, who sits on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/ChrisMurphyCT/status/1332398351002857473?s=20\">tweeted</a>&#160;on Friday.</p><p>Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont, who was Biden's top opponent in the 2020 Democratic primaries, in <a href=\"https://twitter.com/SenSanders/status/1332811718708383746?s=20\">a tweet</a> said the Fakhrizadeh assassination was \"clearly intended to undermine U.S.-Iran diplomacy\" as the Biden administration prepared to take over.</p><p>\"Diplomacy, not murder, is the best path forward,\" Sanders added, decrying Fakhrizadeh's killing as \"reckless, provocative, and illegal.\"</p><h2>The ball is now in Iran's court, but it's faced with a difficult decision</h2><p>If Iran retaliated over Fakhrizadeh's assassination in a major way, it could jeopardize the economic relief it desperately wants.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Karim Sadjadpour, a senior fellow at the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, summed it up via Twitter on Sunday, \"Iran's dilemma: To restore its economy Iran needs a full or partial return to the nuclear deal. To restore deterrence/pride it will want to avenge Fakhrizadeh's death. Doing the latter without sabotaging the former is most difficult. That's one reason why Fakhrizadeh was killed.\"</p><p>Iran will want to avoid targeting US assets in the waning days of the Trump administration, Slim said, adding that the central objective of \"the Iranian reaction will primarily be to establish some form of deterrence against future similar Israeli operations.\"</p><p>Meanwhile, Germany, which has been fighting to save the JCPOA, has urged all parties to exhibit restraint in the coming days.</p><p>\"A few weeks before the new US administration takes office, it is important to preserve the scope for talks with Iran so that the dispute over Iran's nuclear program can be resolved through negotiations,\" a spokesman for Germany's Foreign Ministry <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/28/world/middleeast/iran-mohsen-fakhrizadeh-nuclear.html\">said in a statement</a>.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/iranian-scientist-assassinated-to-make-bidens-job-harder-experts-say-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5fc3d52bbca41b194c423558\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5fc3d52bbca41b194c423558&type=medium&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2>Cyber Monday 2020 deals by store</h2><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Amazon Cyber Monday deals</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Apple Cyber Monday deals</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-cyber-monday\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Best Buy Cyber Monday deals</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kohls-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Kohl's Cyber Monday deals</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/macys-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Macy's Cyber Monday deals</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/target-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Target Cyber Monday deals</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Walmart Cyber Monday deals</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wayfair-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Wayfair Cyber Monday deals</a></li></ul><h2>Cyber Monday 2020 FAQs</h2><h3>When is Cyber Monday?</h3><p>Cyber Monday occurs the following week after <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Black Friday</a>. This year, the online-focused shopping holiday began on Monday, November 30. Typically, deals start at 12 a.m. on Monday. However, we began seeing Cyber Monday deals on Saturday morning onward after Black Friday.</p><p>As a continuation of sorts of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/black-friday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Black Friday</a>, Cyber Monday gives you another opportunity to save on tech, home goods, clothing, and other deals that you might've missed while recovering from Thanksgiving dinner.</p><h3>What is Cyber Monday?</h3><p>Cyber Monday began as the online version of Black Friday, where online retailers offered big discounts to match their brick-and-mortar counterparts. Now, Cyber Monday is the biggest shopping day of the year, surpassing even Black Friday in terms of revenue and sales.&#160;</p><p>The \"holiday\" was created in 2005 as the online version of the brick-and-mortar-focused Black Friday. Previously, the main differentiation between Black Friday and Cyber Monday was that Black Friday focused on in-store sales and Cyber Monday on online sales. But as shopping habits have increasingly favored the internet, amplified by the pandemic, shoppers can look forward to a very online-focused Cyber Monday and Black Friday.&#160;</p><p>Cyber Monday offers a great opportunity to save on all your <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-gift-ideas\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">holiday gifts</a>.&#160;</p><h3>How long do Cyber Monday sales last?&#160;</h3><p>Though Cyber Monday sales once only took place on Monday, we've been seeing them extend to longer and longer durations, with more than a few lasting until the rest of the week. For instance, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wayfair-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Wayfair's Cyber Monday deals</a> will take place all from November 30 through December 4.</p><p>\"Doorbuster\" Cyber Monday markdowns are often restricted to the day and available stock. When we know the end date of a deal, we'll list it next to the deal.&#160;</p><h3>What's better, Black Friday or Cyber Monday?</h3><p>With most Americans sticking to online shopping this year, the debate on which shopping holiday is particularly moot. Both events will be held predominantly online, and more than a few deals overlap. In fact, many Black Friday deals become Cyber Monday deals when the dates change.&#160;</p><p>If possible, shoppers should shop both holidays. We've seen different products receive better discounts on each day, and the deals that each retailer offers will vary.&#160;</p><p>Generally speaking, consumers shopping for big-ticket items, such as laptops, TVs, and kitchen appliances, can expect more opportunities on Black Friday. But for shoppers looking for last year's models, smart home gadgets, digital subscriptions, and gift cards will likely find more luck during Cyber Monday.</p><h3>What should I buy during Cyber Monday?</h3><p>If a retailer offers Black Friday deals, it's a near guarantee that it will offer Cyber Monday deals, too. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Amazon</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-cyber-monday\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Best Buy</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/target-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Target</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Walmart</a> are some noteworthy retailers that we know will participate in the shopping event.</p><p>We will likely see massive discounts on some of our favorite direct-to-consumer products during Cyber Monday, such as retail startups like <a href=\"http://leesa-sleep.lvuv.net/c/196318/236769/4014?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.leesa.com%2F&subid2=1605730967803at4lpbb1j&subId3=xid:fr1605730971019ggi71019ggi\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Leesa</a> and <a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=64892&urllink=www.brooklinen.com%2F&afftrack=1605730967803afom2nnlh%7Cxid:fr1605730971019bhf1605730971019bhf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Brooklinen</a>. For some, Cyber Monday (or Cyber Week) will be one of the few times of the year when their products see major markdowns.</p><h3>Where can I find Cyber Monday ads?</h3><p>Shoppers in-the-know eagerly await Black Friday and Cyber Monday advertising to help guide their Black Friday game plan. Typically, storefronts like Best Buy, Target, and Walmart release their previews late-October or early-November.</p><p>While we don't know an official date when each retailer will release their previews, a smattering of retailers has already posted their advertising online, the biggest being Walmart.&#160;</p><p>Here are the most important ad scans currently available:&#160;</p><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/misc/cyber-monday/pcmcat309500050010.c?id=pcmcat309500050010\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Best Buy</a>: Best Buy's Cyber Monday deals can be found <a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/misc/cyber-monday/pcmcat309500050010.c?id=pcmcat309500050010\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">here</a>. The retailer is offering discounts on everything from TVs to wireless earbuds and smartwatches<a href=\"https://www.bestbuy.com/site/electronics/black-friday/pcmcat225600050002.c\">.</a></li><li><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com/?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fstore%2Fdirectory&xcust=1605730967803a17f4haop803a17f4haop\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Walmart</a>: To find the ad scan, first find your local Walmart via the local directory. Once you get to the \"Store Overview\" page, find the \"Weekly Ad\" section.</li></ul><h3>Will there be Cyber Monday shipping delays?</h3><p>Shipping delays and shopping holidays are inextricably linked, and this year is no different. Experts suggest that consumers may see low inventory and shipping problems, during <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/holiday-shopping-2020-why-consumers-should-shop-early-2020-10\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday, Black Friday, and the weeks following</a>.&#160;</p><p>To help you avoid the shipping crunch and get your stuff sooner, several retailers, including Walmart, Target, and Best Buy, offer in-store pickup and contactless curbside pickup. This means shoppers can grab their orders at a nearby location, provided that the retailer has it in stock.&#160;</p><h2>How we select the best Cyber Monday deals</h2><ul><li>We only choose products that meet our high standard of coverage, and that we've either used ourselves or researched carefully.</li><li>We will compare the prices among top retailers such as <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Amazon</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-cyber-monday\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Best Buy</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/target-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Target</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Walmart</a> and only include the deals that are better than all others offered (not including promotional discounts that come from using certain credit cards).</li><li>All deals will be at least 20% off, with the occasional exception for products that are rarely discounted or provide an outsized value.</li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-tech-deals-sales'>Business Insider</a></div><div style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"medium\" data-pid=\"5d04007b6fc9200d1312b1e7\" data-purchase-option=\"Nordstrom\">Hunter Toiletry Bag (medium, Preferred: Nordstrom)</bi-shortcode><h2>How do we select Cyber Monday deals from Nordstrom?</h2><ul><li>We only choose products that meet our standards for coverage. These items come from trusted brands that we know and use or have tested.</li><li>The deal price must be better than the retail price or the normal sale price.</li><li>We anticipate many deals from Black Friday to roll over to Cyber Monday.</li></ul><h2>When does Nordstrom's Cyber Monday sale start?</h2><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nordstrom's Cyber Monday</a> has already started and deals are expected to expire at midnight PST.</p><h2>What is Nordstrom's return policy?</h2><p>Nordstrom doesn't have a traditional <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&mid=1237&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.nordstrom.com%2Fc%2Freturn-policy&u1=1575059154286aca1mtq0q286aca1mtq0q\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">return policy</a>. Instead, returns are handled on a case-by-case basis, and the company tends to be very accommodating.&#160;</p><h2>Can I shop at the Nordstrom store near me?</h2><p>Yes. Nordstrom's Cyber Monday deals will also be available in stores. You can also order online and choose in-store pick-up or curbside pickup. If you do decide to shop in the store, Nordstrom has taken measures to help keep customers and employees safe by requiring face masks and encouraging social distancing.</p><h2 id=\"what-should-i-buy-from-best-buy-this-black-friday?\">What should I buy from Nordstrom this Cyber Monday?</h2><p>Nordstrom's Cyber Monday sale is a great time to stock up on everything from essentials like socks, underwear, and winter coats, hats, and gloves, to splurge items like sunglasses, handbags, jewelry, and beauty products. You'll also find home goods like pillows, candles, diffusers, and more.&#160;</p><h2>How does Nordstrom stand up to the competition on Cyber Monday?</h2><p>While other department stores will also have Cyber Monday sales, Nordstrom stands out for its great range of affordable brands and luxury brands. Nordstrom's lenient return policy is also a major plus for shopping during the holiday season. You won't have to worry about strict return windows.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/nordstrom-cyber-monday-sale'>Business +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa47bf01df1d50018219306?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"5c41ab18d5886d728f112888d592d74f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-39-297_9ce650df2d4a52da.webp","destWidth":1667,"destHeight":1250,"sourceBytes":90524,"destBytes":90524,"author":"aismael@businessinsider.com (Amir Ismael)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fac3fc97f8f4200182a656e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn10@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-59-035_b38ef999846b90f4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-55-966_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=MmUhhuQ03Z0:WbPKg0aagpQ:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn93@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-55-473_be9b74cab5891c48.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=MmUhhuQ03Z0:WbPKg0aagpQ:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn50@2020_2/2020/12/01/06-05-54-956_80e76ca9dd6797c7.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_1/2020/12/01/06-05-47-414_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=MmUhhuQ03Z0:WbPKg0aagpQ:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn41@2020_3/2020/12/01/06-05-43-695_4e42caa7ec1e21ee.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/MmUhhuQ03Z0":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn14@2020_6/2020/12/01/06-05-49-714_7ce48e7f131482de.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606802719425},{"createdTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","updatedTime":"2020-12-01 14:05:19","title":"Biden urged to pick California attorney who fought sweatshop slavery as new head of Labor Department","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/julie-su-labor-organizers-push-californian-to-be-labor-secretary-2020-11","description":"<figure> \n <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc58e41037cbd0018613024?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages 566010425\" height=\"1200\" width=\"2400\" charset=\"\"> \n  <figcaption>\n   California Labor Secretary Julie Su is photographed at her home in Cerritos, California. \n   <p class=\"copyright\">Katie Falkenberg/Los Angeles Times via Getty Images</p> \n  </figcaption> </img>\n</figure>\n<ul class=\"summary-list\"> \n <li>California labor activists are asking President-elect Joe Biden to select Julie Su as his Secretary of Labor.</li> \n <li>Su, once dubbed the \"bane of deadbeat employers,\" has served as California's Labor Secretary since 2019.</li> \n <li>Previously, Su served as the state's labor commissioner. She also co-founded the group Sweatshop Watch.</li> \n <li>\"Thinking about Julie Su as Secretary of Labor is almost a physical sense of relief,\" one source in the labor movement told Business Insider.</li> \n <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li> \n</ul>\n<p>Labor organizers in Southern California are pushing President-elect Joe Biden to pick a progressive, hometown hero for Labor Secretary, arguing that the state's top labor official — an anti-sweatshop campaigner dubbed the \"<a href=\"https://inthesetimes.com/article/wage-thefts-top-cop\">bane of the deadbeat employer</a>\" — is supremely qualified to protect workers' rights during the pandemic.</p>\n<p>Julie Su has served in statewide office since 2011, when former Gov. Jerry Brown picked her to lead the state's enforcement of labor laws. Before that, at the age of 26, she represented dozens of undocumented Thai workers who were effectively enslaved at a garment factory outside Los Angeles, <a href=\"https://www.good.is/features/thai-cdc-el-monte-raid-twenty-years-later-labor\">a landmark case</a> that prompted federal and state efforts to combat human trafficking; that work was <a href=\"https://www.macfound.org/fellows/677/\">cited by the MacArthur Foundation</a>, which awarded her its \"genius\" award in 2001.</p>\n<p>As labor commissioner, Su turned the state's under-resourced team of worker advocates into \"what could be the most aggressive and effective state labor law enforcement division in the country,\" according to <a href=\"https://inthesetimes.com/article/wage-thefts-top-cop\">a 2013 report</a> from In These Times, a progressive magazine.</p>\n<p>Under Su's reign, California sought the <a href=\"https://www.kqed.org/news/11780059/were-being-robbed-california-employers-who-cheat-workers-often-not-held-accountable-by-state\">largest-ever judgment</a> against an employer in state history, assessing almost $12 million in citations against a construction company. \"[E]mployers who steal from workers will end up paying for it,\" she said at the time.</p>\n<p>In 2019, Gov. Gavin Newsom promoted her to Secretary of Labor, a role that has seen her oversee worker safety and unemployment checks amid a pandemic and recession — experience her advocates believe has well prepared her to do the same on a larger scale.</p>\n<p>\"Workers, especially workers of color, are hurting across the country,\" Marissa Nuncio, director of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/covid-19-mask-shortage-forces-hospitals-to-turn-to-seamstresses-2020-3\">Garment Worker Center in Los Angeles</a>, told Business Insider. \"They need and deserve someone with a demonstrated record of leadership and expertise in fighting for working individuals and families, and Julie's record is exemplary.\"<strong><br /></strong></p>\n<figure> \n <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc58cd150e71a0011558182?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages 569107751\" height=\"1025\" width=\"1366\" charset=\"\"> \n  <figcaption>\n   Julie Su received a 2001 \"genius\" grant from the MacAuthur Foundation for her efforts to protect undocumented immigrant workers. \n   <p class=\"copyright\">Carlos Chavez/Los Angeles Times via Getty Images</p> \n  </figcaption> </img>\n</figure>\n<p>As Bloomberg Law <a href=\"https://news.bloomberglaw.com/daily-labor-report/californias-su-rises-in-biden-labor-chief-race-as-unions-split\">reported</a> last week, Su's odds for a cabinet pick have been aided by a split in union support among contenders who are better known on the national stage, such as US Sen. Bernie Sanders and Rep. Andy Levin. \"I think she's very, very viable,\" Los Angeles County Federation of Labor President Ron Herrera, a supporter, told Bloomberg. \"She's really been a warrior for us.\"</p>\n<p>But, the outlet noted, a lack of public support from organized labor has also been one factor hindering Su's candidacy.</p>\n<p>A letter sent to the president-elect on Sunday aims to address that gap.</p>\n<p>\"It is a critical time for women's leadership and we need a strong woman as US Secretary of Labor, especially a woman of color who understand what it's like to grow up in an immigrant household,\" <a href=\"https://beta.documentcloud.org/documents/20418212-women-leaders-letter-to-biden-11-29-2020\">states the letter</a> signed by Dolores Huerta, the famed farm worker organizer, and the leaders of groups such as the Koreatown Immigrant Workers Alliance, the Pilipino Workers Center of Southern California, and the Los Angeles Alliance for a New Economy.</p>\n<p>\"She fully enforced the rights of farm workers, janitors, and domestic workers,\" the letter says. \"In short, Su has been at the forefront of some of the most innovative policies and enforcement strategies in our state's history.</p>\n<p>A senior staffer at a national labor organization, requesting anonymity to speak freely, said a Su cabinet post would be seen as a big win for the labor movement.</p>\n<p>\"Thinking about Julie Su as Secretary of Labor is almost a physical sense of relief,\" the source told Business Insider. She's spent years leading enforcement in the world's fifth-largest economy and before that fought for workers' rights as an activist exposing labor conditions in the garment industry.</p>\n<p>\"She is widely respected as a labor rights and civil rights attorney, so she truly 'speaks the language' of workers' issues,\" the source said, noting she is also fluent in both Spanish and Mandarin.</p>\n<p>Su \"will walk in that door fully capable, ready to work, and without any serious shadows of past transactional relationships or controversies,\" they added.</p>\n<p><em>Have a news tip? Email this reporter: </em><a href=\"mailto:cdavis@insider.com\"><em>cdavis@insider.com</em></a></p>\n<div class=\"read-original\">\n Read the original article on \n <a Biden","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/secret-israel-saudi-arabia-meeting-suggests-theyre-hedging-on-biden-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fbd3ff232f2170011f70ed2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Netanyahu bin Salman prince thumb composite\" height=\"749\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A composite image of Saudi Arabian Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, left, and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters/Getty Images/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Saudi and Israeli sources say that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman met covertly on November 22, the first such meeting between Israeli and Saudi leaders.</li>\n<li>Secretary of State Mike Pompeo's presence at the meeting indicates that the US supports their closer ties, but the US is about to get a new president, and the two Middle Eastern leaders may also be seeking a more diverse friend group.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p><strong>Full normalization between Saudi Arabia and Israel remains unlikely in the near term, but defense and intelligence cooperation will continue to advance in the coming months. </strong></p><p>Saudi and Israeli sources, speaking to Reuters and The Wall Street Journal, have confirmed that Prime Minister Netanyahu traveled to the Saudi city of Neom on November 22 for a covert discussion with Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman, marking the first-ever such meeting between Israeli and Saudi leaders.</p><p>The conversation between Netanyahu and the Saudi Crown Prince (who also serves as the kingdom's defense minister) focused on normalizing relations and cooperating against Iran. This, combined with the fact that Mossad head Yossi Cohen was reportedly also in attendance, signals deepening intelligence and defense cooperation between the two countries.</p><p><strong>The United States still appears to be interested in facilitating stronger Saudi-Israeli ties, given that US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo allegedly also attended the November 22 meeting in Neom</strong>.</p><p>The administration of US President Donald Trump is trying to use its final weeks in office to cement its legacy abroad. And normalization between Israel and Arab Gulf states (including the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain and Sudan) has been a key foreign policy victory for the Trump White House.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59234ea6dd0895bc588b468a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"trump saudi arabia\" height=\"3297\" width=\"4946\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>President Donald Trump with Abu Dhabi&#39;s Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan at a summit in Riyadh, May 21, 2017.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"http://www.apimages.com/metadata/Index/Trump-US-Saudi-Arabia/d1ab47fb3ce3486082ea6741074a75f9/109/0\" target=\"_blank\">AP Photo/Evan Vucci</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>Saudi Arabia and Israel, meanwhile, are seeking to lessen their reliance on US cooperation by diversifying their international relationships, including with one another, for fear that the incoming administration of US President-elect Joe Biden <a href=\"https://worldview.stratfor.com/article/how-israel-will-try-shape-biden-s-middle-east-policies\">will adopt a moderate approach to Iran</a>, as well as a more critical approach to the region's overall human rights record.</strong></p><p>Saudi Arabia and Israel also have mutual covert concerns about the Houthi movement in Yemen (which is Iran-aligned and threatens both Saudi Arabian territory and Israeli shipping in the Red Sea), and share concerns about Iranian militia and missile build-ups in Iraq, Lebanon and Syria as well.</p><p>A deeper Israeli-Saudi defense relationship would provide new options for the two to counter Iran, particularly in covert operations in proxy theaters like Syria, Iraq and Yemen. It might also soften <a href=\"https://worldview.stratfor.com/article/how-journalists-disappearance-could-affect-saudi-us-ties-khashoggi\">some opposition in the US Congress</a> to new arms sales to Saudi Arabia, as the Israelis become a more overt ally of Saudi national interests and defense priorities.</p><ul><li>On the campaign trail, Biden <a href=\"https://worldview.stratfor.com/article/limits-biden-s-proposed-return-diplomacy-iran\">criticized the Trump administration's \"maximum pressure\" approach to Iran</a>, as well as its abrupt exit from the Iran nuclear deal in 2018.</li></ul><p><strong>In addition to offering the two countries a strategic asset against Iran, further developments in the Saudi-Israeli relationship would be <a href=\"https://worldview.stratfor.com/article/uae-paves-way-arab-gulf-states-normalize-their-israeli-ties\">a boon for Israeli normalization globally</a>.</strong></p><p>Saudi Arabia's still-notable influence in the Muslim world gives its action weight among global opinion. As Riyadh warms to Israel, its actions could mollify attitudes around Israel in other Muslim-majority countries, boosting momentum toward normalization in states such as Pakistan, Indonesia, Malaysia and Bangladesh.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f6b5ead862a00001153f7b6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"saudi king salman neom\" height=\"855\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Saudi King Salman bin Abdulaziz arrives at the airport in Neom, August 12, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Saudi Press Agency/Handout via Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>Closer Israeli-Saudi ties would also prove economically beneficial for both countries.</strong></p><p>Saudi Arabia, and in particular its high-profile development projects like Neom, are reliant on advanced technologies such as biotech, agricultural tech and cyber technologies to succeed. And Israel is already among the global leaders in these sectors.</p><ul><li>In return for normalization, the United Arab Emirates' private and public sector is gaining rapid access to Israeli technologies.</li></ul><p><strong>However, Saudi Arabia has not yet shown that it's prepared to make the jump to normalization with Israel without the formation of a Palestinian state.</strong></p><p>Saudi media has been <a href=\"https://worldview.stratfor.com/article/eying-normalization-saudi-arabia-changes-its-tone-israel\">attempting to normalize conversations around Israel</a>, shifting away from the kingdom's previous blanket censorship of the subject of Israel as an issue. But Saudi Arabia's official line, and one upheld by King Salman, remains that normalization of the two countries' ties will only happen with a final peace deal that includes a Palestinian state as laid out in the Saudi-led 2000 Arab Peace Initiative.</p><p><strong>Domestic backlash in Saudi Arabia could also cause notable security concerns.</strong></p><p>Normalization remains broadly unpopular among the Saudi population and in the traditional, King Salman-dominated establishment. Given the spate of recent terror attacks in Saudi Arabia, including a relatively rare Islamic State attack triggered by <a href=\"https://worldview.stratfor.com/article/muslim-world-turkey-carries-torch-rising-anti-france-anger\">the renewed controversy in France around the Prophet Muhammad cartoons</a>, extremist sentiment remains clearly present in the kingdom and able to inspire violence.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/secret-israel-saudi-arabia-meeting-suggests-theyre-hedging-on-biden-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a Cyber Monday.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Crystal Cox/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cyber-monday-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday 2020</a> is coming to an end, but you can still score deals on laptops at <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-buy-cyber-monday\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Best Buy</a>, Microsoft, Amazon, and many other retailers — whether you're looking for a top-of-the-line touchscreen laptop or something more budget-friendly</p><p>Some of our top picks, like the Dell XPS 13, are available at a discount as part of this year's deals. You'll even find deals on Apple computers, which don't usually go on sale. If you just need an affordable basic machine, there are deals on Chromebooks, too.</p><p>When shopping for a laptop, it's important to consider what you intend to use it for. If you're looking for a laptop primarily for entertainment and working from home, you might consider one with a larger 15-inch or 16-inch screen, for example. But, if portability is a big priority, check out a more compact 13-inch model.</p><p>You'll also want to make sure you have enough processing power and memory to handle the tasks you need it for. Laptops with at least 8 GB of RAM are usually good enough for most people, but if you're a video editor, professional photographer, or software engineer, you may need more than that.</p><p>Be sure to check out all our <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cyber-monday-tech-deals-sales\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cyber Monday tech coverage</a>.</p><h2>Here are the best Cyber Then it shut down.</a></h3>\n  <ul>\n   <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/influencers-say-talent-management-firm-iq-advantage-failed-on-promises-2020-11\">Sydney Bradley reports that talent-management firm IQ Advantage took money from influencers by promising to grow their Instagram followings.</a></li>\n   <li>IQ Advantage required influencers to pay a $299 deposit when they signed contracts.&nbsp;According to industry experts, this type of deposit should be a red flag for influencers.</li>\n   <li>When Business Insider started talking to influencers who had signed with the agency, IQ Advantage shut down.</li>\n  </ul>\n </section>\n <h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/influencers-say-talent-management-firm-iq-advantage-failed-on-promises-2020-11\">Read the service chatbot startup Kustomer for an undisclosed financial sum to grow its e-commerce ambitions.</a></li>\n    <li>The transaction reportedly values Kustomer, which allows businesses to pull customer conversations from various channels into a single screen, at around $1 billion.</li>\n    <li>Kustomer aggregates customer conversations from various channels into a single screen and automates some features for businesses.</li>\n   </ul>\n  </section>\n  <h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/facebook-nears-deal-to-buy-chatbot-startup-kustomer-wsj-2020-11\">Read the full
